Text: rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga tA \u0f85 sha ya kro d+ha sa ma dza su ga ta sA mA n+yo d+ba da na ke sha lo hi ta tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa khro bo 'dus pa/ bde gshegs spyi dril rta mgrin rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud ces bya ba dpal pad+ma dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na// ye shes rig pa rang snang gi ston pa de nyid// gdul bya'i ngo snang la tha dad par snang ba las// dpal pad+ma dbang byed du snang bar mdzad nas// shes bya rang snang gi gnas nas gdul bya dngos snang gi gnas tha dad par snang ba las/ shes bya rang snang gi 'khor dang// gdul bya ngo snang gi 'khor mang pos kyang yongs su bskor// shes bya rang snang gi bstan pa nang du bstan pa rdzogs nas// gdul bya'i ngor snang ba'i bstan pa nam mkha'i mtha' la/ chos nyid kyi dgongs pa'i khyad par la longs spyod cing bzhugs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ chos can mtshan ma'i dngos po dang// chos nyid skye ba med pa so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med na yang// don dam par ni chos thams cad stong gsal nam mkha' lta bu la sems nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes dri ma med par rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba yang/ kun rdzob tu chos thams cad dngos po dang mtshan mar snang ste// de dag kun kyang gsog lta bu/ gsob lta bu/ ya ma brla lta bu/ snying po med pa lta bur shar ba las/ cir yang ma yin pa'i chos nyid ni/ cir yang snang du btub la/ cir yang snang ba'i chos nyid ni/ cir yang 'gyur tu btub la/ cir yang 'gyur ba'i chos nyid ni/ cir yang bsgrub tu btubs la// cir yang bsgrub tub tub pa'i chos nyid ni// cir yang grub par gzigs so// de yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad gtan la dbab par bya na rigs pa rnam pa bzhir gzigs so// spyir rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la// ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas sgrub par byed pa ni// chos nyid kyi rig pa dang/ 'bras bu'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa dang// rgyu'i sgo nas sgrub par byed pa ni ltos pa'i rigs pa dang// rigs pa nyid dri ma med par byas te sgrub pa ni 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa bzhir gzigs so// 'di rnams kyi sel ba rnam pa bzhir gzigs so// ngo bo nyid la the tshom za ba ni chos nyid kyi rigs pas sel lo// byed pa la the tsom za ba ni bya ba byed pa'i rigs pas sel lo// mngon par sgrub pa ni the tshom za ba ni ltos pa'i rig pas sel lo// rigs pa la the tshom za ba ni 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pas sel lo// 'di rnams kyi yul dang mtshan la gzigs pa ni/ chos nyid kyi dngos gzhi la dri ma med cing// dngos bzhi ma log na chos nyid kyi rigs par gzhag go/ byed pa la dri ma med cing dngos gzhi ma log na bya ba byed pa'i rigs par gzhag go/ dngos por bsgrub pa'i dri ma med cing dngos gzhi ma log na ltos pa'i rigs par gzhag go/ rigs pa'i dngos gzhi la dri ma med cing dngos gzhi ma log na 'thad par bsgrub pa'i rigs par gzhag go/ de la chos nyid kyi dngos gzhi la dri ma yod pa ni/ me shel la tsha ba'i reg pa yod pa lta bu'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni/ ri dwags me'i gtsang spra can la me tsha ba'i dngos gzhi log pa lta bu'o// bya ba byed pa'i dngos gzhi la dri ma yod pa ni btsan dug gis sems can 'chi ba lta bu'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni rma bya lta bu'o// ltos pa'i dngos gzhi la/ dri ma yod pa ni blo dman pa'i sa bon ma go ba'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni sa bon skye ba'i bas la mkhas pa lta bu'o// 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i dngos gzhi dri ma yod pa ni chos spyi dang rang gi mtshan nyid la rmongs pa'o// de la dngos gzhi log pa ni/ so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis dpyad pas mi dmigs pa'i shes rab tu gyur pa kho na'o// rigs pa 'di bzhi thal ba la gzigs pa ni// chos nyid kyi rigs pa sgrub pa thal drags na/ dngos po thams cad las mi ldog ste/ mtha' rang bzhin rgyur lta bar 'gyur ro// bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa thal drags na// byed pa po dang rtsod pa po thams cad las mi rdog ste/ mtha' byed pa po rgyur smra bar 'gyur ro// ltos pa'i rigs pa thal drags na/ dbang thams cad las mi ldog ste/ mtha' dbang
ro// 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa thal drags na/
rigs pa gnas skabs thams cad du dri ma med par mi 'gyur te/ mthar mngon pa'i nga rgyal tu 'gyur ro// 'di
por smra ba rnams dngos por bsgrub na// chos nyid kyi rigs pas lta ba
bsgrub ste// 'du shes kyi byad par
du byas pa'i blos dmigs pa dang/ tshor bas khyad
par du byas pa'i blo la
ba dang/ shes rab dri ma med pa'i khyad par du byas pa'i blos rtogs

pa'o// de yang so sor rtogs pa'i shes rab dang/ rnam par mi rtog pa'i shes rab bo// bya ba byed pa'i rigs pa ni// mtshan bcas bskyed pa'i r-im pa dang/ mtshan med rdzogs pa'i rim pa dang/ sa dang lam dang 'bras bu'i bya ba byed do// ltos pa'i rigs pas ni sa las dge sdig la ltos pas 'bras bu mthong ris ngan song bsgrub pa dang// bsod nams ye shes kyi tshogs la ltos pas chos sku dang zugs sku bsgrub pa'o// 'thad pa bsgrub pa'i rigs pa ni mngon sum dang// rjes su dpag pas/ chos thams cad gtan 'bebs par bsgrub pa ni/ rang gzhung bsgrub pa dang/ gzhan gzhung dgag pa'o// de yang yod par bsgrub pa dang/ yin par bsgrub pas chad pa sel te/ med pa dgag pa dang ma yin pa dgag pas rtag pa sel lo// mtha' thams cad las grol ba'i chos nyid rnam par dag pa la gzigs nas cang mi gsung/ rnam par mi gsung/ yongs su mi gsung bar bzhugs so// de'i tshe yum ral gcig mas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas/ 'di skad ces gsol te/ 'jig rten sa dang lam gnas pa'i// blo rtog dpyad pas ma 'ongs pa'i// de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes ni// lus ngag yid las bya dang bral// tshogs gnyis bsags las ma byung ba'i// sems nyid rnal ma'i don 'di ni// kun gyis rtogs par dka' bas na// dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa 'dir// 'jig rten dregs pa dbang bsdus nas// bya ba byed pa'i las la 'khod// sangs rgyas bstan pa dar byas nas// dkon mchog gsum
lam kun spyod pas// 'khor ba 'das par sbyor ba'o// ltos pa chos kyi las can 'bras// sangs rgyas mdzad pa kun bsgrub nas// dri med
rgyas// 'khor 'das kun gyi rtog bya ba'i// sems nyid 'og gsal rtsa ba can/ dngos grub log rtog gang las skyes// dug lnga ji ltar lam du blang// dbang chen
rus nad rnams gtong// thun mong
sa bcu ji ltar bgrod// rig 'dzin rnam bzhi

par can// sbyor ba'i yan lag rnam drug bsgom// bdag dang mtha' yas 'gro ba rnams// rje btsun 'bangs ltar bskyang du gsol// lha rjes gcong nad bsal du gsol// slob dpon shes bya bslab du gsol// dge legs las 'bras rtsal du gsol// bla mas man ngag bstan du gsol// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen pos shod// ded dpon rin chen sbyin du gsol/ dpa' bos g.yul ngo bzlog tu gsol// yid bzhin gter chen dbyung du gsol// nyi zla'i 'od zer spro ru gsol// mun pa'i sgron me sbar du gsol// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor du gsol// 'dul ba'i dus bab bshad du gsol// zhes gsol ba btab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ye shes sgron mes chos kyi dbyings su shar ba'i dgongs pas gzigs nas 'gro ba'i ched du 'di gsungs so// smon lam las 'phro sad pa dang// lus dang skal bar ldan pa dang// dad ldan brtson 'grus che ba dang// shes rab rtogs pa ldan pa yi// sgrub po rten gyi gang zag rnams// sems nyid ma bcos rnal ma'i don// kun gyis rtogs par dka' bas na// rang bzhin gdod nas dag pa'i don// blo rab 'ga' yis rtogs par 'gyur// bskyed pa'i rim pa gsal ba yis// bsod nams tshogs chen rdzogs par 'gyur// rdzogs pa'i rim pa bzang po bsgom// ye shes tshogs mchog
yang dag 'bad par bya// ye shes bsgrub pas 'jig rten bkol// rnal 'byor tha mas dngos grub
ma'i rnal 'byor la// rim par bshad kyis skal ldan nyon// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang che bde gshegs spyi dril las//
bslang rngog ma le brgan gyi le'u ste dang po'o//// de nas
'das kyi gsungs pa// kun nas nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chos// rnam par byang pa mya ngan 'das// rtsa ba sems kyi chos nyid 'dus// sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ma mdzad ma bcos lhun gyis grub// byang
ye gnas pas// byed rtsol bya ba kun dang bral//
sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// rang gi ngang gis ma bcos bzhin// yongs kyi 'od gsal chen po la// sems nyid yid bzhin rin po che// khams gsum sems can
rang la gnas yang ma mthong ste// 'o ma mar dang 'dra bar

de nyid mkhas ldan mar du 'byin// kye sems kyi dkyil 'khor rang bzhin gyis// 'od gsal chen por gnas pa la// rgyud ni sems can gnas pa dang// snang lam bar dor 'byung ba dang// 'bras bu rang ngo shes las zin// 'di gsum gang gis brtag 'gyur ba// gsang ba yang gsang bla na med// skal dang ldan pas thud la nyon// sems can rgyud la gnas pa ni// sgo nga'i nang gi bye'u phrug bzhin// kun gzhi gzugs med khams su snang// de nyid rtsa ba
kyi gzugs kyi khams su snang// de nyid zhe sdang rtsa ba can// sgo nga 'dod pa'i khams su snang// de yang rtsa ba
'dod chags nyid// dug gsum rtsa ba byang chub sems// kun gzhi dge sdig gsog pa'i snod// rin chen sna bdun bang mdzod du// nyon mongs lnga yi byan mo ni//
los sgyur rgyal btsun mo yin// yid kyi kun rtsal
pa ba yang nyid la// kun tu rgyu ba'i chang bas btsal// sgo lnga khye'u pho mo mdzes// kun la bskyed cing mched par byed// 'di dag gcig
'dres pa ni// chu dang lan tshwa 'o ma'am// sgog pa chu dang lan
ltar// ma 'dres yongs su rdzogs pa la// nam mkha'i 'ja' tshon bzhin du gnas//
dor gcer bur byung ba ni// sems ni pha ma'i gos dang bral// dge sdig bag chags las kyis bsgos//
snang ba ldang gyur pa// gnyid log sad dang brgyal sangs ltar// nyi ma'i dkyil
kyi nus pas kun gsal byed// sems ni rang bzhin 'od gsal bas//
'od kyis 'gengs// 'od gsal las kyi bag chags dbang// sngon du
med bya// sdig pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa rnams// ngan song gsum du gnas par 'gyur// zhe sdang 'dod chags gti mug dbang// dmyal ba yi dwags dud 'gros 'byung// dge
mi la chags pa dang// zhe
dag sgo lnga'i bag chags dbang// 'dod pa
yid dbang btsan sa gzugs kyi khams// 'od gsal lha
ldan// kun gzhir 'dzin pa gzugs med pa// yi gzugs
ldan// 'bras bu ra bas zin pa yang// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// yul du snang ba
stong du// sems su snang ba rig pa stong// stong nyid rig
po'i chos skur bzhugs// rang bzhin ma bsgribs 'od gsal ba// gzugs sku sgyu lus rnam par snang// stong nyid snying rje'i bdag nyid can// gti mug mi rtog chos
zhe sdang gsal ba longs spyod rdzogs// mun pa bral ba'i nyi ma shar// 'dod chags snying rje'i yul du snang//

gsum 'khor ba'i sems can 'dren// sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i ting nge 'dzin// zhes gsungs so// dpal pad+ma dbang chen rngog ma le brgan bde gshegs spyi dril gyi rgyud las/ sems rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o//// de nas dbang chen pad+ma'i rgyal pos gsungs pa/ rtsa ba sku gsung thugs rnams dang// spyad pa dang blang mi spang shes// bsgrub par

bya ba lnga lnga pa'o// bsrung dang nyams skong skyon yon rnams// dngos grub lo tog smin pa'i sa// thams cad kun gyis bsrung bar bya// yi dam lha ni spang mi bya// rang sems spang du ga la btub// bla ma rang gi spyo bor 'khur// rgyud lung man ngag ster bar 'gyur// rdo rje ming srid chos kyi spun// 'di dang phyi mar mi
ba lo rgyun bya// yab kyi sku ni

tshig rgya// 'phro 'du las kyi phyag rgya la// chos nyid zhi ba chos kyi rgya// srog chags bsad nas zhing bcu bsgral// gzungs ma sbyar nas gsang dbang bskur// ma byin pa blangs dngos grub bsgrub// tshig btsun sngags bzlas bgegs dpung gzhom// rgyun du
spyad dang// snod ngan kun la gsang

ngag gis brda' yis smra ba dang// yid kyi brda' yis mtshon pa ni// bsgrub pa thams cad mtshon par bya// dri chen bza' dang dri chu btung// byang sems sha chen rak+ta bza'// mi rta ba glang bya khyi'i sha/ zas mchog bdud rtsi'i gtor ma yang// rak+ta 'thung zhing za ba'o// gti mug chos dbyings ye shes ni// mi rtog byol song kun gyis rtogs// zhe sdang me long ye shes ni// gsal bas tsha grang dmyal bar sbyong// 'dod chags sor rtog ye shes ni// de bas mi dang yi dwags spyod// nga rgyal mnyam nyid ye
ni// sran tshugs lha rnams rgyud
la ldan// phrag dog bya grub ye shes ni//
ma yin// 'di dag ye shes rnam pa lnga// mi spang rnal
sems dang bsre// phung po rigs lnga 'byung lnga yum// rnam
dbang po dus// yid chos nyon mongs rigs sogs rnams// thams cad ma lus rigs lngar 'dus// kun 'dus bde gshegs spyi dril nas// dbang
he ru ka/ rlung dang sems su 'dres pas

dbang chen pho nyas 'gugs dang 'dren// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang// dus bzhir gshegs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// kun kyang rigs lnga pad+ma'i sku// rigs kyi sangs rgyas bsgrub par bya// lus kyi bya ba ma lus dang// ngag gi smra brjod thams cad dang// sems kyi bsam pa
mang po rnams// don du gnyer nas bsrung bar bya'o// rtsa ba yan lag thams cad kun// nyams par gyur
ma dang// sbyin sreg dag gis bskang bar bya// ma bskangs rdo rje dmyal bar 'gro// ngan song sdug bsngal bzod par dka'// ma nyams bsrung bar gang byed pa// bde sbyin yon tan bsam mi
chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma le brgan gyi
'dzin gyi le'u ste gsum pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dbang chen gyis// rgyud lnga lam du klong la 'di gsungs so// nga ni gti mug gnyid
la dga'// rmi lam lam du klong bar byed// nga ni zhe sdang lam la dga'// zhing bcu bsgral nas sgrol bar byed// nga
nga rgyal ri bo che// lta ba mtho la ting 'dzin gsal// nga ni 'dod chags
chos la dga'// yum la sbyor zhing gsang dbang bskur// nga ni kun la
ba yang// mi rtog don la
dang 'dra ba'i mi rtog med// khams gsum 'khor
ba'i sems can rnams// mi rtog
nyid sgyu ma ltos// dgug dang log dang byang ba dang// 'byongs na chos
ma rig mun pa sha chang drod// ngal dub drag pos 'byung
'dab bzhi la// gnyid 'gugs sngags kyis 'gugs par byed// oM A nu d+ha ra hU~M phaT swA hA/ gnyid du song ba shi

sku// rnal 'byor can gyis bsgom par bya// sems ni gnyid la zin gyur na// brag la 'dzegs dang g.yang la skyur// chu la mchongs dang rbab la 'gril// rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal byang ste// chos rnams rmi lam lta bu la// rmi lam

kyi bsam gtan yin// chos rnams nyams su myang bar bya// 'byongs na lcebs kyang 'chi ba med// mtshon zug dug 'thung g.yul 'gyed pa// thams cad rang gi sems la sbyangs// ma 'byongs par du sbyang bar bya// ye nas 'khor 'das chos rnams kun// rmi lam yin par shes gyur na// rnal 'byor gti mug 'byongs pa yin// de phyir rmi lam gnyid du shes// sems can bde ba thun gcig na// kun gzhi'i nang du yid thim pa//
kyi sku la gnas par bya// yid kyi rgyu ba mang
su chos sgra dbyer med pa// ngo bo nyid skur rab tu gnas// skyes bu gnyid log sangs rgyas
bshad// 'khor 'das chos rnams ma lus pa// ye nas 'od gsal ma bcos pa// sems nyid
bzhin 'od gsal bas// zhe sdang nam mkha'i sprin ltar dengs// de nyid
rol na// sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod// yid kyi rnam

byed pa'i mkhan po khyod// rtsad bcad khungs ni khyod nyid yin// kun bzang khyod las thams cad byung// khyod kyis khyod nyid shes par gyis// 'gugs dang sbyangs dang sgo bkag nas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par sbyangs// dkon mchog gsum gyi spyi dgra dang// rdo rje slob dpon sku dgra dang// mched dang

lcam dral sgos dgra dang// dam med dam log 'dus par yong// dam dgra ngan pa'i ngang tshul can// yongs la gnod dang ngan song chud// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por dgug/ brod bskyed sbyang bar bya ba'o// bsgral bar bya ba'i spyi mgrin snying// ste ba gsang ba rkang pa'i mthil// a nr-i su tri pre du dang// A+oM dang AHhU~M swA hA lam// 'od 'phros rigs drug gnas stongs nas// phyogs bcu dus gsum rgyal ba mnyes// ma dang mkha' 'gro'i thugs dam bskang// gsung dang thugs dang sku ru 'gyur// rigs lnga rgyal ba'i sku la thim//
sgo yang bkag/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho skya ling btab// phung

mchod yul bsod nams tshogs// dam bskangs lha mnyes ye shes tshogs// chos sku dri ma med pa dang// gzugs sku longs spyad rdzogs sprul dang// zab dang rgya che'i sku gnyis so// thos 'gyur ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// ma bskul log pa'i bstan par grags// sangs rgyas chos rnams nub 'gyur pas// sku gsum 'gro ba'i lam dang bral// 'khor ba'i gnas
zag par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'phel// ngan
rmad byung che ba rdzogs// theg chen zab mo'i lta ba rtogs// rmad byung spyod pa khyad par 'phags// theg pa kun nas rab gsungs pa'i// mtshams med las ngan byed pa rnams// mnar med dmyal bar skye ba
gsang sngags gsang ba'i theg pa
pa rnams// rdo rje dmyal bar skye 'gyur bas// las ngan rgyun
lam bcad nas ni// las ngan
bsags tshogs gnyis rdzogs// sku gsum 'bras bur rdzogs 'gyur bas// khyed kyis zhe sdang can rnams sgrol// de'i phyir
rgyu rang grol gyi gsang sngags 'di gsungs so// nyung

dkar lan tshwa byi brun bsres// sngags ni lan dgu bzlas la gdab/ pra du sad/ na ra sad/ tsit+ta na le sad/ du sha sad/ pre dur sad/ thibs mug sad/ bya la byed na spu na phaT/ ra lug la ni nyung dkar dang// byang ba dang ni chang phud do// dgra la byed na gzugs la'o// gnas ngan 'khor ba nas mya ngan 'das par sgrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nga rgyal gzhi rgyu las 'bras can// skyon dang yon tan nyid kyi rdzogs// mngon par mtho bas lta ba rtogs// nga rgyal chen
nyid che bas rnam par bsgyings// pha
'dzin gsal// sems nyid ye shes 'od gsal bas// ma rig mun pa la bsgrib tu med// chos rnams sems kyi cho
pas// sems las log na bsgom du med//
du khyer// 'bring dang tha mas bsgom
par bya// gzung 'dzin gnyis su rang
lta// rtag tu 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho zad// rang
sems rtag par ther thug pas//
byed pa byas// las dang rgyu 'bras med par 'dod// chad par blta pas log pa'i
lam// chos dang gang zag bdag 'dzin na// mos pa chung ba'i nyan thos yin// chos khams phyogs gcig bdag
dmigs pa phra ba'i rang sangs rgyas// 'khor 'das rang sems tsam du 'dod//

rdzob don dam gnyis su 'byed// theg chen sems tsam dbu ma bas// theg chen rang gi gzhung rnams bsgrub// ye shes mu bzhi bral ba dang// snang ba sku la grag pa gsung// dran rtog thugs kyi lta ba ni// rigs gsum kun 'dus kri ya ba// mar bzhin spyod pa yar bzhin blta// rigs bzhi 'byin pa u pa ya// rnam par snang mdzad chen po la// sku gsum rdzogs pa yo ga ba// phung po khams dang skye mched rnams// thabs dang shes rab ma hA pa// rang sems yid gzugs chos la 'jug/ gnyis sbyar bde sras a nu ba// snang ba chos sku chen po la// bcos bslad bral ba a ti pa// bsam brjod mtha' bral ye shes 'khyil// dbyings dang ye shes 'du 'bras med// ji ltar snang ba bde chen sras// 'khor ba nyid ni mya ngan 'das// kun
gzhi sems kyi me long nyid// ye nas zhi gnas chen por gnas// yid kyi dran rtog mang po rnams// lhag mthong chen por rang gsal bas// zhi gnas
snang srid gnyis med ngo bo nyid// lta sgom sku bzhi rdzogs sangs rgyas// lta sgom don du mi gnyer ba// 'khor bar
sku bzhi 'du 'bral med pa yi// A+oM hrI sa ti sa ma ti b+ha la A+oM/ nga rgyal lam du byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin te// 'dod chags gzhi rgyu da lam 'bras dang// skyon dang yon tan ldan pa yis//
la lus kyi bde ba med// bde ba chen po 'dod pa yis// de rgyu 'dod chags yin shes bya// bud med la brten bde chen po// sems can kun rnams spyod gyur pa// tha mal
pa spang ba yis// bde chen gar gyis rol pas bya// brtags shing
bde rtogs nyams su blang bar bya/ rgyal
mo ma dang srid mo bu// tsha mo sru mo bran g.yog mo// che
bag dang ldan gyur zhing// bkur por lci bas rgyal mo 'dra// rang nyid rgyal po'i tshul bzhin
lus bskyed de la pha ltar
lta bar byar// lus kyi dum bu las chad
bu mo lta bu la yang
brgyud pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan
yod// sru mo la ni sbyar bar bya// mngag pa'i las rnams
pa pa yi// bran mo la yang
bya// bya ba'i las rnams byed
rnams// thams cad chung mar shes
yum rnams spyan drang bstim// sangs rgyas yum du bsgom par bya// bdag nyid dbang chen phyag rgya che// hU~M dang a las byung ba
zhing// tsaN+Da lI'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba
bya ba'i rim pa'o// chags pa'i
mdog gis gzung bar bya// dung gi phur pa 'debs pa
dbab cing gzung bar bya// nye ba'i bsnyen pa bya ba'o//
b+han d+ha thod pa'i nad// rdo
bcu gnas// bde bral bde ba gzung bar
ba'i rim pa'o// rdo rje thod sbyor man ngag gnyis// rdo rje dung khrag dkrug par
bya// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes la// yid ni brtan par nang du bzung//
rang rdzas thig le mkhar phebs nas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' mchod// d+hU pa dzaH/ pun+pe hU~M/ dA+e ba baM/ g+haN+De ho/ lA s+ye hU~M/ mA me trAM/
hrIH/ nir ti a/ pU dza ya pU

ra Na sa ma ye swA hA/ rang dang slob ma'i lce yi ni// thig le dkar dmar bza' bar bya// dngos grub yum gyi mkha' nas blang// byang sems thig le gsang dbang bskur// bsgrub pa chen po'i rim pa'o// bde ba mchog bde bde bral che// lhan cig skyes dga' nyams su blangs// zung 'jug

thob gyur pa// yab yum 'du 'bral med par gnas// 'dod chags bde ba spang ba ni// zung 'jug sku yang spang ba yin// 'dod chags ye shes chen po 'thob// thabs lam yon tan ldan pa yis// rig 'dzin dngos grub 'thob pa ni// tshe 'di nyi
mnyam// mkha' spyod gnas su gshegs gyur pa// mkha' 'gro'i gtso mchog he ru ku// rje btsun dbang phyug chen po 'gyur// 'dod chags kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ phrag
dog bzhi dang rgyu lam 'bras// skyon dang yon tan rnams kyis bshad// rang nyid
pa ngan pa nyid// gzhan rnams shong bar ma gyur pa// gzhan smod
ba ni// phrag dog 'byung ba'i gzhi yin no// rang sems
'byung ba'i rgyu// shan 'byed pa dang la bzla bas// lta ngan
bya// yid ni so sor rtog pa yis// shes rab kyis ni chos rnams kun// ma 'dres so sor shan yang 'byed// 'khor

stegs rtag pa chad pa gnyis// nyan thos bden pa rnam pa bzhi// rang rgyal rten 'brel bcu gnyis dang// dbu ma kun rdzob don dam dang// kri ya lha rigs gsum gsum dang// u ba ya ni rigs bzhi dang// yo ga de kho na nyid bzhi// ma hA bzhi dang khro bo dang// a nu yab yum bde chen sras// rdzogs chen thig le nyag gcig rnams// ma 'dres gzha' tshon skar ltar gsal// yongs su rdzogs par la bzla na// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ma lus rang sems nyid la rdzogs// sems las log na chos med pas// chos sku snang

nas rdzogs sangs rgyas// rnal 'byor sangs rgyas thob 'dod na// rang gi sems las btsal bar bya// rang sems nyid las ma gtogs pa// sangs rgyas gzhan nas thob 'dod na// bya long nam mkha'i mtha' 'tshol 'dra// de phyir rang sems chos skur ltos// rang sems ye
rgyas par ma shes ma rig pa// dmus long nam mkha' spar mos 'dzin// ye nas rdzogs sangs rgyas shes na//
bsam brjod bral bas chos skur gnas// 'khor 'das dbyer med de kho na// phrag dog don ni ma rtogs na// so sor rtog pa'i shes rab kyis//
mi shes// mi dmigs pa yi
rdzogs mi shes// ma 'dres yongs rdzogs ma shes nas// gnyis 'dzin mtha' las grol mi 'gyur//
ba'i chu bo mi sgrol bas//
khyad par dang// gzung 'dzin gnyis snang thams cad dang//
lta ngan gzhan pa ma lus rnams// thams cad shes par 'gyur ba'o// kun
'dus pa rngog ma leb rgan gyi rgyud las/ dug lnga lam du slong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//// de nas bde gshegs rgyal ba yis// 'gro ba'i don du 'di gsungs so//

snang// yid 'jug bsam pa'i gzugs can 'dis// 'khor 'das bya ba ma lus bsgrub// yid ni rang bzhin ji lta bar// shes bar 'dod na rgyud 'di nyon// de skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// rigs gnyis lung gi rgyud pas na//
pad+ma dbang gi bka' stsal to// rgyud
shes par 'dod pa yis// lus ngag yid gsum btud de nyon// mo ha ka dang

mat+sa t+ya iraShA ka// kun nas nyon mongs 'khor ba'i chos// thams cad 'di las byung bas na// 'di don yid la dril te rtog/ gti mug byal song rnam mang po// phyi yi rgya mtsho'i kha na gnas// zhe sdang dmyal khams bco brgyad po// rdo rje gdan 'og tsha grang gnas// nga rgyal lha yi 'jig rten rnams// ri rab phyir rtse nam mkhar gnas// phrag
lha ma yin gyi gnas// ri rab khong seng dag na gnas// ser sna dmyal ba yi dwags gnas// grong khyer ser skya dag na gnas// gling bzhi'i mi rnams 'dod chags
rab 'bring thams cad dbang po rno// gti

las// rdo rje 'chang du rnam par snang// nga rgyal rin chen 'byung ba nyid// rdo rje nyi ma dkon mchog dpal// 'dod chags snang ba mtha' yas nyid// tshe dpag med pa snang bar mdzad// phrag dog don yod grub pa'i sku// gdon mi za
rta mchog nyid// nang sems nam mkha'
rnam snang las// sku yi bde
gsum mchog snang mtha' tshe dpag med// tshogs chen yongs 'dus 'byung bar 'gyur// thugs mchog mi bskyod rdo rje 'chang// pad+ma gsang bar 'byung bar 'gyur// yon tan
dpag med// rin chen rta mchog 'byung bar 'gyur// phrin
dang gsung dang thugs yon tan// bde gshegs
pad+ma dbang chen mtha' yas spro// 'khor bar

chos rnams kun// mya ngan 'das par gtan la 'bebs// rnam byang mya ngan 'das par snang// las sgrib med par ye sangs rgyas// 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das par gtan la pheb pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// 'di
dang gnyan dang sa bdag la//
gti mug blo yi ngan gtad do// zhe sdang

tu snang ba'o// 'dod chags can la snang ba yang// dbang du sdud par snang ba'o// nga rgyal can la snang ba yang// thog dang sor bar snang ba'o// phrag dog can la snang ba yang// sngags pa nang 'gras phyir bzlog snang// thun mong dngos grub las tshogs rnams// bskyed rim rdzogs

gnyis su snang bar zad// 'das pa snang ba'i rnal 'byor la// rang sems chos skur shes gyur pa// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur snang// sems can yid kyi rnam shes can// 'di la dran pa sna tshogs 'char// yum gyi tshogs la 'jug 'gyur pas// yid dang chos su 'dres gyur pa// dbyings dang ye shes gzhan na med// nam mkha' nyi ma shar ba ltar// dbyer med stong gsal gang yin pa// sems nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// rnal 'byor lam la gnas gyur na// thos bsam bsgom
pa'i shes rab kyis// dbang chen
bde gshegs 'dus pa yi// dgongs pa sems

la brtag par bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa'i dgongs pa/ rta mgrin rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'khor ba'i chos dang rnam par byang ba mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams cad dug lngar 'dus pa
le'u lnga pa'o//// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs yon phrin
dbang chen pad+ma'i sku la gnas// sku ni rab tu
chos sku zhi ba las// ye shes sgyu lus longs spyod rdzogs// thugs rje sprul pa'i skur shar ba// de yi zhugs gnas

gzhal yas gnas// lha nyid rang sems bde ba yi// cha shas dum bur gnas pa las// 'byung chen lnga las skur grub pa// gcig las sku gsung thugs yon las// ma lus rdzogs par snang ba las// dbab drang bstim dang mchod 'bul bzlas// bstod nas 'dod don bcol bar bya// chos rnams gdod nas ma bskyed pas// rgyu rkyen bral ba'i byang chub sems// mtshan ma'i
grub pa// ye nas chos sku chen por gnas// chos dbyings
spros med nam mkha' las// ye shes nyi ma rang shar ba// cis kyang ma bsgribs 'od
ba// ye shes sgyu lus longs
kun gyi thugs yin pas// rtsa ba yid kyi rnam shes nyid//
yi ge sprul pa'i sku ru bsgom//
rnams stong gsal nam mkha' nyid// chos dbyings
yum gyi b+ha ga las// thams cad 'degs
mar 'khyil ba snang// chu nyid khrag las grub pa yi// rgya mtsho zab cing rgya yang che// ri rab rus
ni ye shes 'bar// ye shes lnga yi gzhal yas khang// ma skyes
gsum sangs rgyas gnas// lhun grub yid bzhin gnas kyi mchog/ chos dbyings ma
dang gzung ba'i yul// thabs dang
mar 'dzin pas na// thugs kyi phyag mtshan lta bur byung// kha dog dbyibs legs kun yid 'ong// dbu gsum phyag
ba nyid// kha T+wAM ga ni lha
la ye shes mda'// nyon mongs tha ba
'phrul gyi// zhabs bzhi thabs dang shes rab
dbyug tho dang// sdigs mdzub zhags pa
lcags kyu dang// sprul gyi zhags
pa'o// thugs ni mthing nag rdo
bu bsnams pa nyid// phrin las ljang nag rdo rje
gcig ma// rdo rje thod pa g.yon nas 'khril// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i//

sogs pa/ lcags kyus 'dren cing phur bus 'debs// dkyil 'khor lha rnams gsal bar bya'o// A+oM pan+mAn+ta kr-i ta hrI ta ha hU~M phaTaH/ A+oM ya mAn+ta kr-i ta hU~M/ A+oM badzra he ru ka hU~M/ A+oM shrI he ru ka dzA la raM hU~M/ A+oM badzra kI li kI la ya hU~M/ oM e ka dza ti hU~M/ A+oM badzra pa tsa la mu kha hU~M/ A+oM badzra bak+Sha ti mu kha hU~M/ A+oM hU~M/ A+oM trAM/ A+oM hrIH/ A+oM hA/ ji ltar mi dbang chos mthun par// dang por snyan gsan dbab par bya// dbyings nas bzhengs su gsol ba dang// spyan drang brtan par bzhugs pa dang// phyag 'tshal mchod par rol nas ni// rnal 'byor bzlas pa bya ba
yang// spro bsdu rdo rje'i bzlas pa'o//
ni brtan zug chu ni 'bab// me 'bar rlung 'thor nam mkhar
stong// zhi ba rgyas pa dbang drag lhun// dang por dmigs pa brtan pa yis// bsgom pa zab mo rab
bya// chu bo rgyun gyi rnal 'byor pa// glal dang
'bar ba'i sgron ma yis// gnyid 'thibs rmugs pa
chen 'thor rlung drag po yis// dgra bgegs nad rnams gtor bar bya// nad dang gdon dang bag chags sgrib// nam mkha'i sprin
par bya// sngags kyi yi ge nyal nas dkar// zhi
rnams langs par gyur na rgyas// mjug tu puSh+tiM gdags par bya// 'khor bar gyur na dbang du ste// pa shang ku rus
nas gnas// A+oM pad+ma krod+ha krod+hI shwarI
raM hU~M phaT/ khams gsum gnas
rlung dang sems la brten// ji ltar gnas bzhin bzlas pa yang// rnal 'byor can la dgos pas 'bad// 'dod
gnas// pho dang mo dang ma ning
rgal rlung la bskyor bar bya//
bcas 'khor ba zag med 'dam// sems can lha srin sangs
sems kyi mi// zhon nas tshogs pa
rtog can sgraul bar bya// phyi rol snang ba
nang du sems la bsdu bar bya// mi smra ba yi yi ge
nang gi sems nyid snang ba ni// phyi yi yul la 'jug pas
yul gyi bdud rtsi bstan pa'i phyir// drag po khros pa'i khro bo hU~M// yul sems gnyis su snang ba yang// blo dang dngos po
bsres pas na// gnyis su med par snang bar bya// skye med a ni khong na gnas// ma bcos don gyi rnal ma la// rig pa'i blo yis sbyor 'dod na// sku dang gsung dang thugs bsgrub pa'i// rgyud
la dad pa rab tu bskyed// ces gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma
le brgan gyi rgyud las/ sku
bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di gsungs so// rang sems snang ba nyams drug las// lus la rtags drug khro bo'i sku// des mtshon phyi rol rgyan
rdzogs par gnas// 'di ltar gang gis shes nas grol// sku gsung phrin las mdzad pa'i zhal// phyag drug 'gro drug pha rol drug/ zhabs ni tshad me rdzu 'phrul ston// glang
su gyon// thod pa sbrul dang rgyu mas mtshan// thal ba zhags dang rak+ta btab// rtags rnams don du rdzogs par byed// bcom ldan rta
ye shes lnga// thabs chen gar dgu
la rdzogs// yum chen ral gcig chos kyi dbyings// shes rab skye
med par sbyor// ma 'gags sprul sku gnyis su snang// sku gsum ye shes lngar 'grub gnas// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma
rgan gyi rgyud las/ sku rgyan rnam dag gi
pas bcad// de nyid nyams su lon par bya// 'byung lnga bum gyi
gtor dbang mkha'// shes pas ma zin dus bzhi'i

rigs drug ye nas mgron gyi lha// rang bzhin lha zhes tshims pa'i mchog/ chos can mtshan mar snang ba kun// ye nas chos nyid mtshan ma med// chos can chos nyid dbyer med pas// rnal 'byor dbang phyug yi dam lha// lta ba 'di la gang gnas pa'i// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po rnams// ye nas snang srid snod dang bcud// lta ba'i gtor ma chen por gnas// mtshan ma las kyi
ma yang// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// zan dang khur ba bu ram dang// sran ma bcos pa lta bu dang// 'bras dang gro dang til dkar dang// bra bo me tog ser
dang// thams can lhun gyis grub
du bcas// sbrang rtsi gser gyi

dang ldan// bu ram smug pos brgyan pa dang// ba dang 'bri gnag rdzas dang bcas// rigs kyi sems can kha dog las// 'byung ba gtor ma nyid du gnas// sems can ma lus sha khrag lus// klad pa rkang dang sha khrag dang// thams cad gtor mar gnas pa'o// de nyid ye nas kun gnas pa// sha lnga bdud rtsi chen po yang// mi sha glang po rta bya khyi// 'di dag kha zas chen po ste// rdzas su
dag bsags te dbul// phyi snod
kyi gtor mar gnas// gsang sngags 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor bas// ye shes lha rnams rab mchod bya// rig
byed rlung nag kun 'bud pas// spyod pa rlung g.yob me la brten// sreg byed
chen me ru 'bar// rab 'jigs thod pas 'degs pa ni// rnam gsum 'bar ba brjid pa'i steng// lhan d+ha 'khor yug mdzes la che// pad+ma 'dab ma bzhi dbus 'bar//
rdzas ni 'dod yon rnam pa drug/
sa ma ya swA hA/ b+h+rUM las byung ba'i gzhal yas khang// rab mdzes sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i gnas// 'byung lnga'i snod ni kun gyi gnas// sangs rgyas
nas rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// de las
gtogs gzhan med pa'o// khyad par dpal gyi gtor ma 'di// rgyu mchog
tshogs kyi 'khor lo mchod// bsnyen bsgrub rnam pa gang byed kyang// 'dzin pa'i gtor ma
por bshad// b+h+rUM skyes lha yi khang pa la//
tu mdzes pa'i rgyan ldan bsgom// gtor ma bde'u gtso bo
shes so// mtheb skyu 'khor tshogs sprul pa'i
tshogs// yab yum ling+ka b+ha gar sbyar// dri med

rtsi byang chub sems// dpa' bo ro dang yang dag ldan// slob mar gtor mas dbang bskur bya// dus gsum bde gshegs rgyal ba'i sku// sku yi byin rlabs lus la zhugs// bde ba chen po'i dbang bskur bas// na tsha sdug bsngal sbyang du gsol// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba rnams// gsung gi byin rlabs ngag la zhugs// rmad byung gsung sgras dbang bskur bas// sgra skad kun la dbang bsgyur shog/ dus gsum phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rnams// thugs kyi byin rlabs sems la zhugs// skye shi med pa'i dbang bskur bas// sku gsum rtogs pa 'bar bar mdzod// A+oM sarba ta thA ga tA ya/ d+harma
la liM ta/ a b+hi Shiny+tsa a/ spyir na sangs rgyas rigs lnga yi// phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab kyang// gtor ma'i phrin las las rab mchog/ dpal gyi gtor ma skung na nyal// sha khrag

pa'i gtor ma yongs la khyab// dam tshig gtor ma bskyed par bya// gzhal yas lha yi dkyil 'khor tshogs// ye shes lha mo 'gugs par bya// lha dang 'dod yon rigs lnga'i chu// gta' gtor rgyun gtor gtor dbang bskur// gnyis med gtor ma dbul bar bya// lha la lha thim dbul ba dang// dbyings la ye shes thim pa dang// ye shes la yang ye shes rol// chos nyid la yang chos nyid thim// bdud rtsi rang lus lha ru gsal// gtor ma gtang bar bya ba ni/ bsgrub pa gta' yi gtor ma yang// chos kyi dbyings

bya ba dang// mi zad longs spyod gter du sba// yun du gtor ma bsgrub byas nas// tshugs par bskyal nas gshegs pa dang// gtor snod mnan la bro yis sbyang// gtor ma'i las rnams rdzogs par bya// sha khrag dmar las bsgrub pa ni// gang la bsrung na gnyer du gtad// sdang gnod kun la zor du 'phang// thams cad ma lus gnan par bya// sprul pa gang la gda' 'dod par// 'das dang 'jig rten yongs la bsdo// tshad med thugs rje'i gtor ma 'di// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// dbang gi rgyal po chen po las// trAM las 'dod pa'i yon tan 'byung// trAM rat+na dre lo kya// maitri ka ru Na// su kha sa ma ye/ a nr-i su tri pre du

khA hi khA hi/ zhes sku'i mchod pa gtor ma'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta mchog rta mgrin la// don dam rang bzhin rak+ta ni// 'khor 'das kun la khyab par gnas// chos dbyings mtshan ma'i spros pa bral// rnam par rtog pa'i blos ma bslad// rang bzhin ma bcos sar gnas pa// chos rnams 'byung ba'i gzhir grub ni// kun tu bzang mo yum gyi mkha'// dus gsum sangs rgyas kun bzhugs pa// bcos ldan de bzhin gshegs kun gyi// sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje snying// btsun mo'i b+ha ga'i nang na bzhugs// ma rtogs khams su sems can rnams// der gnas de las 'byung ba ni// gzhan min de

'phrul ba'o// ma rtogs 'khrul ba'i rak+ta ni// kun rdzob snod dang bcud du shar// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' lnga// yum lnga'i rak+tar snang ba dang// 'byung ba lnga yi rak+ta 'dzag/ khrag zhun phyogs bzhi dbus lnga nas// yum gyi pad+ma rak+ta thig/ thams cad ma lus rak+tar snang// sems can kun la gnas pa yi// chags pa'i rak+ta'i rgya mtsho ni/ khrag gi chu yis gling bzhi 'degs// khrag gis gso byed ste ba'i bcud// khrag gis kun ngoms srog bcud 'dzin// mtshan ma rdzas kyi rak+ta ni// byin brlab lha la dbul bar bya// phyi yi rak+ta mtshal la sogs// 'byung ba dmar por snang ba dang// nang gi rak+ta sems can kun// sna tshogs pa yi khrag rnams sbyar// gsang ba'i rak+ta chen po ni// 'bras bu lnga bsgral bud med khrag/ de kho na nyid chos kyi dbyings// mthar 'dzin lta ngan brlag par mdzad// sgrub pa'i rnal 'byor ming sring rnams// rak+ta rtogs par gyur nas shom// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// rak+ta bskyed cing spro ba yang// b+han+d+ha pad+ma'i zhal bu nang// pad+ma rak+ta sna tshogs khrag/ bdud rtsi chu yi dpa' bor sbyar// ma dang mkha' 'gro 'du ba'i rdzas// lhar gsal thugs las yi ge ram// rak+ta'i rgya mtsho rba rlabs 'khrugs// rak+ta mU la ka dz+wa la maN+Da la hU~M/ khams gsum snod bcud rak+ta dgug/ raM las spro bar bya ba'i 'od// mchod pa phul
la 'khrugs// rak+ta raM s+pha ra Na phaT/ rak+ta khaM saM ha ra Na hU~M/
snod kyi gzhal yas na// khrag
mtsho dmar nag 'khyil ba'i bcud// rkang
chen rdo rje rtse lnga'i skyogs// dang po snang srid rak+tas khengs// gnyis pa rag gi snod du 'dus// gsum pa
khams rak+tas khengs// khaM raM sangs rgyas
pa dbul// rak+ta dz+wa la mU la ka kha raM khA hi/ don rtogs rak+tas kun sangs rgyas// rigs
lnga rgyal ba yab dang yum// ye shes lnga
na bzhugs// gsung rak+ta'i mchod pa'i
ting nge 'dzin to// de nas dbang mchog rgyal
gsungs// lus khams bdud rtsi chen
po lnga yi rgyal ba mchod//
ched kyi dam tshig bdud rtsi bsgom// stong pa'i ngang las las kyi lha// ljang nag

snod// nyi ma zla ba'i kha bcad pa'i// nam mkha' rdo rje rtse lnga bsgom// gsung gi cho ga bya ba ni// dpa' bo 'bru lnga'i yig 'bru las// thugs kyi phyag mtshan rnam lngar 'gyur// rgyal ba rigs lnga'i lha sku bsgom// ye ges bdud rtsi dgug par bya// rta yi rgyal po'i phyag rgya bcas// lu gu rgyud kyi phreng thag

'od 'phros 'og min sku lnga gnyis// nam mkhar spyan drangs 'od du zhu// ye shes bdud rtsi chen por dgug/ na ba'i sman la 'chi ba'i gsos// oM AHhU~M/ sarba pany+tsa ma mr-i ta hU~M hrIHtha/ gnyis su med pa'i bdud rtsi las// rnal 'byor pa yi sor mo lnga// ye nas rigs lngar gnas pas gtor// rnal 'byor pa'i chag nyams skong// sgrub pa po yi bar
lcam lta ba yo ba srong// ma dang mkha' 'gro
rgyas mnyes// dam nyams dam sri
chod// mchod pa'i rdzas rnams gsang
bya// A+oM badzra yak+sha kro d+ha hU~M
yang gdags// theg dman spyod pa zil mnan

brjod// rnam rtog ngan pas rgyud bcings pa// sman la bshags pa rab tu bya// bsgrubs pas las la 'bras smin pas// sku gsung thugs kyi dgos grub blang// drin la lan gyis blan pa'i phyir// gsang nan sbreng mchod dbul bar bya// tshogs bsag sgrib pa sbyang
phyir// 'dod pa'i don la gsol ba gdab// ngas ni ma 'ongs phyi rabs la// dgongs pa'i gol sa gcad
phyir// khyed la legs par bshad
lus khams bdud rtsi lnga// rgyal
lngar gnas pa yin// dgongs pa 'dzab la brten byas nas// lcags la ngar btab bzhin du 'gyur// rang lus bdud rtsi chen por gnas// dri chen rnam
byang sems mi bskyod me long bzhin// sha chen rin 'byung mnyam pa nyid// rak+ta snang mtha' so sor rtog/ dri chu don grub bya ba grub// thams

lus bdud rtsi lnga// lus pa med par ye sangs rgyas// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba ma lus dang// yi dam bla mar bcas pa dang// grub thob rdo rje ming sring sogs// dus gsum pha ma'i tshogs la dbul// ye nas bdud rtsi rnam dag pa// mchog dang thun mong grub rdzas la// ma rig ma rtogs log par bzung// don dang 'gal ba bzod par gsol// bdud rtsi chen po'i rgya mtsho nas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// mtheb srin rtse sbyar e yi gzugs// sku gsung thugs kyi
grub blang// srid gsum ma lus sems
gyi// sha yi mchod pa 'di bzhes la// ma rig gti mug gsal ba dang// gzugs med 'khor ba stongs nas kyang// mi rtog dngos grub bdag la stsol// khams gsum 'gro ba thams
zhen pa bcad pa dang// 'dod khams 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i dngos grub stsol// stong gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// rus pa'i
mchod pa 'di bzhes la// gzugs khams 'khor ba rgyun chod la// gsang ba'i dngos grub
du gsol/ dug gsum rgyu rnams gtan nas byung// bde gsal mi rtog shar
bar mdzod// khams gsum 'khor ba dong nas sprugs// mchod pa dam pa bzhes su
kyi spun gyis bsdus pa yis// rdo rje mched dang lcam
gyi rkyen bgegs bzlog pa dang// yun gyi sgrib pa sbyong ba dang//
kun// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor lo'i mdzod// thugs bdud rtsi'i mchod
ldan rta mgrin gyis// phyi rabs rnal 'byor don dgongs nas// che ba'i
kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i pho
po'i skur ston pa// snang ba mtha' yas tshe dpag med// sprul sku'i byang sems spyan ras gzigs// 'dul
ye shes mtshan ma bral// me long ye shes 'gag med gnas//
gsal skye ba med pa'i ngang// stong rig chos sku chen po las// gzugs sku longs
sa bcu longs spyod rdzogs skur bstan// rigs drug 'khor
A li kA li'i tshogs las sprul// 'khor 'das gtan la 'bebs byed pa// rmad byung chos kyi 'khor lo
pas te// bem stong chos nyid
rtogs sems la chags pas ru//
yul sems gnyis med las mdzad ka/ bdag gzhan gnyis
ru ka dpal khro bo'i gtso//
pad+ma'i rgyal po'i khro bo'i sku// ha ha hi hi'i sgra sgrog pa// dbang chen gsung la phyag 'tshal bstod// ma skyes sems
gtan la 'bebs// kun gzhi sems kyi pho brang du// las dang bag chags gting nas grol// yul sems gnyis su 'dzin pa'i yid// phyi nang
'dzin rnam par grol// gti mug mi 'byed rtog dang bral// zhe sdang 'od gsal chen por 'bar// 'dod
chen por shar// nga rgyal lta sgom ri bos gnon// phrag
ngan shong mi byed// dbang chen thugs la phyag
khyod ni yid bzhin rin po
gyi 'dod pa ma lus skong// phye ni lha yi
chen po'i chu bo 'bebs// khyod ni
ye shes dkor gyi bdag/ theg
rlung gi 'khor lo yis// stong gsum 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa// 'jig rten nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor lhar// 'gro drug
dbang chen yon tan phyag 'tshal bstod// sgeg pa'i nyams
gang mdzad la// 'dod chags dbang phyug 'dul bar mdzod// khyod ni dpa' bo chen po
bdag gi lus la gar rnams 'char bar mdzod// rgod pa'i nyams kyis ha ha bzhad pa ni// gzhon nu smin

drug rta skad drag pos btul// gshe ba'i gar gyis hi hi gshe ba ni// tshogs kyi bdag po glang po'i sna can btul// rngam pa'i gar gyis hring hring za byed rngam// sgra gcan rA hu la ni rngam pas btul// gsung gi gar gyis gsung gi gar mdzod la// bdag gi ngag la sngags su
bar mdzod// snying rje'i gar gyis thugs rje'i rol par mdzad// brgya

pa sgrol bar mdzod// ngo mtshar gar gyis ngo mtshar bskyed par mdzad// klu chen se sha ra tsa bsgral bar mdzod// zhi ba'i gar gyis zhi ba 'dus mdzad pa// me lta drang srong chen po sgro 'bar mdzod// thugs kyi gar gyis thugs kyi gar mdzod la// bdag gi sems la nyams
bcom ldan dpal chen pad+ma he
phyag 'tshal bstod// lha mchog khyod la bdag gis bstod pa yis// sems la nyams kyi
snang ba phyi ru 'char// ngag la sngags kyi snang ba 'char bar byed// yul la mthong snang snang ba 'char
snang ba rmi bar mdzod// ces

bstod pa lung bstan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen rta mgrin bde gshegs 'dus pa pad+ma gsang ba bkod pa rngog ma leb rgan gyi rgyud las/ mchod bstod kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug chen po yis// yang gsang rmad byung dgongs pa la// bsnyen pa thems par gyur pa na// chos sku snying po byang chub sems// de nyid shes pa spros dang bral// sa thob sbyong yul gzhal
nas// dgongs pa lta can longs spyod rdzogs// mos
'gro la snang gyur ba// grub pa chos kyi phung
can// rgyal ba sku gsum dag dang mnyam// rnal 'byor rab kyi dgongs

thugs dam rgyud nas bskul ba ni// rnal 'byor 'bring gi dgongs pa yin// lus ni lha sku'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// ngag ni bzlas pa'i gsang sngags can// thugs ni yang dag don du blta// rtags tsam 'dzin par rab gnas pa// rnal 'byor kun gyi dgongs pa ste// rab tu 'bad nas bsgom pa yang// rnal 'byor tha ma'i dgongs pa yin// de dag rnal 'byor brda skad gsungs// ma ltar byams la sring ltar gdung// ma mo mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma// pheM pheM hri yi sgra dag la// thal mo'i sgra dang rnge'u chung sgra// rkang gi gling bu thod pa'i rnga// cang te'u sgra rnams bsgrags pa dang// zhing gi g.yab mos g.yab pa ni// dang po brda yang sprad bar bya// dur khrod chen po'i gnas brgyad nas// bde gshegs mkha' 'gro chen mo dang// rdo rje zhe sdang srog la rngams// rin chen nga rgyal sha za mo// pad+ma 'dod chags khrag 'thung ma// las kyi phrin las chen po rnams// nam mkha' bar snang sprin bzhin du// klong rdol bya nag 'bab pa ltar// gti mug sha yi sa gzhi la// 'dod chags khrag gi rgya mtsho 'khyil// zhe sdang rus pa'i ri rab la// mi rtog bde gsal nyams skye zhing// khams gsum gdug pa'i dgra dang bgegs// sgrol phyir 'gyings shing rngams pa yis// rab tu gnas su 'byung ba ni// bar du klong rdol byon pa yin// dug gsum gtor mas tshim pa dang// bdud rtsi chen pos tshim pa dang// rak+ta dmar gyis dgyes pa ni// mngag pa'i gnas su yud
kyis 'ong ba ni// tha mal las la bkye
bdag gi rnal 'byor bsam gtan can// rta skad thengs gcig bsgrags pa yis// bsgrub pa'i rnal 'byor chen po rnams// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig rnams// nyams chag bskangs par gyur nas ni// thun
mong grub chen brgyad la sogs// mchog gi sku gsung rang

g.yar dam can la dngos grub ster// rta skad thengs gnyis bsgrags pa yis// rje mo blon mo ma sring dang// bran dang pho nya bka' nyan dang// ma mo mkha' 'gro rnal 'byor ma// dam la gnas pa thams cad kyang// tshar bcad rjes su phrin las mdzad// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang drag/ drag dbang rgyas dang zhi bar byed// rta skad thengs gsum bsgrags pa yi// mos pa chung ba'i nyan thos la// bden pa bzhi yi chos kyang ston// dmigs pa phra ba'i rang rgyal la// rten 'brel bcu gnyis chos bshad de// theg chen byang chub sems dpa' la// kun rdzob don dam chos kyang gsungs// bya ba las kyi kri ya la// rig gsum mgon por rnam par snang// u pa ya la rigs bzhi nyid// lta ba spyod pa ston pa dang// yo ga rigs lnga mngon byang chub// kun rig rnam snang chen por gsungs// rnal 'byor che la thabs chen snang// rjes su rnal 'byor yab yum che// shin tu rnal 'byor chos kyi sku// rgyud lung man ngag snang ba'o// rta skad thengs gsum dgongs pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas sangs rgyas rta yi mchog/ phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba

dus bzhir gshegs pa'i bde gshegs kyis// dbang chen las la sbyar nas gsungs// drag po'i gnas nas sa blang la// gang gnong sa blang bsres nas kyang// dkyil 'khor dkyil du mthing nag e// zla gam rnam gsum dmar po'am// zlum po zhi ba dkar la yang// gru bzhi ser po rgyas pa la// sgo dang rdo rje ra ba dang// me dpung dur khrod brgyad dang bcas// khrag sna dug sna'i phu bas bri// bya rog gang ga'i sgro sogs nang// mi rkang mtshon gyi skud pa can// ro ras zhing lpags gro shog la// klu gnyan sa bdag srog rtsa gcad// sbrul dang sdig pa sbal bas brgyad// nA ga tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad// su mi tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ sa khrag tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ dgra bo'i srog rtsa gcad pa'i phyir// ling+ga ming rus sngags dang ldan// sha truM tsit+ta mA ra ya rbad/ che ge mo tsita mA ra ya rbad// gdug pa'i bgegs ni pho mo la// gang yon gzugs bris sngags kyis gzir// sarba bi g+ha nAn srog mA ra ya rbad/ e sarba big nan mA ra ya rbad// ming rus rkang gi phur pa dang// seng ldeng dag las byas pa dang// lcags kyi phur pa dag gis gdab// gla

kI li kI la ya rbad// rdo rje phur pas btab byas nas// lus rnams kun la gzer bar bya// mthing nag gru gsum nang du yang// ro shing tsher ma can gzer nas// yugs sa bshan pa'i me blangs nas// me lha dbang gi rgyal po'i zhal// mi rkang zar bu chen po'i nang// dug khrag ril bur ling+ga bcug/ sha khrag sna tshogs mchod pa 'bul// nyung dkar yungs nag rdo phye dang// gri ma dung mtshon chas thun du brab// raM r+dz+wa la raM mAM sa rak+ta kha raM khA hi/ sa sa sha ri shag ti tIk+ShA che ge mo mA ra ya thun b+h+yo// lha khang rming bar mtshon bcas dang// byin ldan gdung gi pu ri'i 'og/ rab gnas ldan pa'i mchod rten dang// bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po dang// rgya gram lam dang zam pa'i sna// lha klu btsan 'gong dur khrod gnas// shing gcig drung dang 'gyu ba'i srang// de ru gang rnyed thod par mnan// nya dang sram dang khyi sbyang dang// wa sogs gcan gzan thod par mnan// nA ga pa tri sha truM staM b+ha ya laM nan// srog la 'khor lo bskor ba ni// gdug pa gsum la srog rtsa gcad// gnod pa'i bgegs la srog rtsa gcad// sdang ba dgra la srog rtsa gcad// de dag drag po'i las rnams kyis// dpal gyi 'phreg sngags zab mo ste// gsang ba chung ba 'di dag go/ A+oM hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ta rul bi rul sarba bi Sha g+ha ta ga/ dz+wa li ta bi s+phu Ta ling+ga/ an+TAT+Ta hA sa/ sa DA a
To pa TaM kA ra/ badzra khu ra ni r+g+gA ta na/ tsa li ta ba
d+hA ta la ni shwA sa mA

ru to tik+Shap+ta d+ha ra Ni d+ha ra/ b+hI Sha Ni aT+rA T+Ta hA sa/ a pa ri mi tA ba la ba rA krA ma/ ar+ya ga NA b+hI ta b+hu ta ga NA d+h+yu yaM ta/ bud+h+ya bud+h+ya/ h+ya grI wa/ khA da khA da ba ra man+t+rAn/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ bin+d+ha bin+d+ha/ pa ra mu drA na/ sid+d+hi m+me di
sha ya/ sarba dz+wa ra bi sha tsI dI na/ sarba gra he Sh+wa pra ti ta to b+ha ba/ badzra daM Sh+ta kiny+tsa rA

ya si/ i dan du Sh+ta gri ha Na/ du Sh+ta sarbaM pA/ dU na d+hu na/ ma tha ma tha/ marda marda/ pA Ta ya bA' Ta ya/ ma Ta ma Ta/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ bud+d+ha d+harma sa g+hi a nu dz+nyA taM karma ku ru shI g+h+raM/ ha ya grI wA ya phaT/ badzra ye phaT/ badzra gA trA ya phaT/ badzra ne trA ya phaT/ badzra daM Sh+tA ya phaT/ badzra khu rA ya phaT/ khu ra ni r+g+hA ta nA ya phaT/ pa ra ma n+t+ra binA sha
ya phaT/ sarba tri lo kya b+ha yaM
phaT/ sarba karmi ShA pra ti
phaT/ badzra ku la san+t+ra sa nA ya phaT/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ phaT phaT phaT swa hA/ gang la dmigs pa 'joms par byed// khyad par klu yi dug rnams sel// dug
ma lus thams cad kun// 'byin par
gsal sngags so// namaHsa man+ta kA ya wA ka tsit+ta badzrA
NAn/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ b+han+d+ha b+han+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ da ha
tsa pa tsa/ gardza gardza/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ sarba big+hA

nA ya kA nan/ ma hA ga Na pa ti/ dzI bi tAn+ta ka dzA ya phaT/ lha srin bgegs dang sa bla 'di// gdug pa'i bgegs rnams ma lus pa// lus dang ngag sems la dmigs na// bgegs rnams gsod pa'i mchog yin no/ A+oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba duSh+tA na phaT/ kI la ya kI la ya/ sarba pA paM hU~M phaT phaT/ hU~M hU~M badzra kI la ya/ badzra d+ha ra Adz+nyA pa ya ti/ kA yA wA ka tsit+ta/ badzra kI la ya hU~M phaT/ oM pa d+mAn+ta kr-i ta/ ts+tshin+d+ha ts+tshin+d+ha/ ha na ha na/ dIp+ta tsakra hU~M phaT/ A+oM pad+mAn+takr-i ta hrIH/ aM b+hur+b+ha baHphaT/ A+oM pad+mAn+tA kr-i ta badzra rA dza hU~M/ 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// phur pa lus la gdab par bya// pad+ma'i phyag rgyas bzung byas nas// phur ba ngag la gdab par bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bzung nas ni// phur pa sems la gdab par bya// sdang ba'i dgra bo ma lus pa'i// lus ngag sems la gdab bya na// de ma thag tu myur du 'gro// 'byung bzhi 'thibs nas tshe srog bral// gal te gso bar 'dod pa na// gang so de la btab par bya// dril bu'i sgras brgyal sangs ba ltar// 'chi ba de yang langs par 'gyur// dbang chen bde gshegs 'dus pa/ pad+ma gsang ba bkod pa rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ gdug pa gsum dang dgra bgegs srog rtsa gcad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//// de nas phyogs dus sangs rgyas kyis// gsung gi las mdzad rta yi mgrin// mthar byed chen po dpal gyi dpal// las bzhi'i s+yin sreg rab tu gsungs// dkyil 'khor zlum zhing dkar ba la// 'khor los rab tu brgyan par bya// gru bzhi gser gyi mdog can la// rin chen 'bar bas 'tshon par bya// zla gam dmar po gyur pa la// pad+ma lcags sgrog bri bar bya// gru gsum kha dog nag po la// ral gri mtshon cha sna tshogs brgyan// gru gsum zla gam zlum po la// gru bzhi rgyas pa lhun gyis grub// ba lu dang ni glang ma dang//
rgyas pa'i hom du bya// seng ldeng dang ni mdzo mo
cad tshang bar gyur pa na// lhun gyis grub pa'i shing zhes bya// 'bras chan nas dkar til dkar dang//
dang khur ba dang// ba ser 'o ma'i gtor ma rgyas// ram bu'i zan dang nas dmar dang// ba
'o mas gtor ma dbang// sha dang khrag dang dug dang ni// til nag gtor ma drag po
lhun gyis grub pa'i gtor ma
dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// zhi ba'i phur bu zlum po
shing rnams la// dbang gi phur bu zla gam bya// lcags sam nag po'i

rnams la// drag po'i phur pa zur gsum bya// mgo zlum sked pa gru bzhi la// zla gam zur gsum lhun gyis grub// dung can ma dang phyal pa dang// lcug phran ma dang ban glang can// pad+ma gcig dang sdong gcig ma// me reg ma dang ri dwags can// phrin las bzhi la so sor bya// kun dag tshang na lhun gyis grub// dngul dkar stag ma'i shing rnams la// zhi
dang ra gan shing sar rgyas// zangs
gi sbyin sreg gsar bu bya// lcags
ni// drag por yang dag gsungs pa la// phrin las bzhi yi dbyibs ldan pas// lhun gyis grub pa'i gzar bu yin//

zlum po'i zhal// dang ba'i sems dang rab ldan pa// rgyas pa'i khro zhal gru bzhi la// dga' ba'i sems kyi ting 'dzin bya// dbang gi rta gdong zla gam zhal// chags pa'i sems kyis mchod par bya// drag po khro zhal gru gsum nyid// khros

kun tsang zhal ni khro zhal gsum// rta mgo nyid la lhun gyis grub// zhi ba'i me ni dge slong ngam// bram ze gtsang ma dag las byung// rgyas pa rgyal po 'gyur ba dang// 'byor pa can las blang ba'o// dbang gi smad 'tshong bud med dang// 'gro ba bzang mo dag las blangs// drag po yugs sa pho mo dang// bshan pa dag las blang ba'i me// kun ka tshang bar gang gyur pa// de ni lhun gyis grub pa'i me// spyan sprin dkar po zhi ba nyid// rta gdong dpral ba zhur po las// sangs rgyas lta stangs sna rtse la// yang
dbyings// rgyas pa'i mig sprin ser

po la// rta mgo phrum phrum ser por gnas// mi yi lta stangs sa gzhi nyid// yang na thang dkar ri la blta/ dbang gi mig sprin dmar po la/ rta mgo rngog ma le brgan te// bud med lta stangs bar snang la// yang na zur mig 'phred la blta// drag po'i mig 'bras mthing nag la// rta mgo ljang gur gnas pa nyid// khros nas sdang mig bzlog pa ste// yang na gdug par mig 'gyur bya// lhun gyis grub pa'i lta stangs ni// rta gdong gzi mig khra bor blta// byams pa'i sems kyis zhi ba la// gnyen dang bshes la bya ba yin// rgyas pa'i sems kyis dga' ba la// gnyen dang bshes la bya ba yin// dga' ba'i sems kyis chags pa la// gnyen dang bshes la bya ba yin// drug po'i
kyis btang snyoms la// gnyen dang
la bya ba yin// byams pa'i sems ni bu yin la// snying rje ba ni pha dang ma// dga' bar rang gi chung ma nyid// btang snyoms byang chub dag la dgod// sdug bsngal
la byams pa la// phongs pa rnams la snying rje bas// gnyen bshes rnams la dga' bar bya// dmu rgod can la btang snyoms nyid// thams cad
na lhun gyis grub// dgun dang dpyid dang dbyar dang ston// phrin las bzhi dang lhun gyis grub// sa
dang chu yi rlung// me yi
dang rlung gi rlung// las bzhi so sor rgyu ba dang// lhun gyis
dkar ser dmar dang nag/ du ba 'khor lo rin chen pad// ral gri rgya gram 'bar ba ni// las bzhi
phyi dro 'og ma gnyis// dgong dang srod dang tho rangs langs// las
dang// dpal dang 'byor pa rgyas pa dang// yul
pho mo dbang 'dus dang// dgra bgegs bcom dang gnas su shis// thams cad tshang bar lhun grub nas// phr-in las brtsam pa'i dgos pa gsungs// yon tan las bzlog skyon du 'gyur// me long lto
bzhi 'degs// lho na 'dzam gling sog kha'i dbyibs// gru

gsum me ni kun la snyoms// nub na ba glang zlum po chu// phyi yi rgya mtsho lcags ri'i nang// byang na gru bzhi sgra mi snyan// sa yi dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas// dbus kyi ri rab lhun po nyid// thams cad rin chen lhun gyis grub// zhi ba'i tshe na nub tu blta// rgyas pa byed na byang du blta// dbang gi las
dus na lto ru blta// dbus
ste// lus la kun tshang lhun gyis grub// b+ha ga phyi mtshams gru bzhi la// sna rtse gru gsum bya rog gdong// skye gnas zla gam dag tu
tshogs 'dus pa zlum po nyid// b+ha gar kun
gyis grub// kun gzhi zhi ba yid ni rgyas// nyon mongs dbang la sgo lnga drag/ tshogs brgyad lhun gyis grub pa ni// de kho na nyid ces kyang bya// stong pa zhi
pa// lhun gyis grub par gnas pa'o//

rnams rgyal dang yi dwags dang// dmyal ba drag por gnas pa la// 'gro ba kun la lhun gyis grub// yA ni zhi ba ma ni rgyas// baM ni dbang la drag po e// yi ge bzhi yi dbyibs ldan par// e baM ma yA lhun gyis grub// dpa' bo chen po'i
dbang drag dang// kun tshang lhun gyis grub pas na// phung
bdud dang nyon mongs bdud// lha bu'i
bdud// zhi rgyas dbang drag lhun grub
sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las
gsang ba'i gsang sngags 'di dag phyung ngo// shAn+tiM ku ru oM AHhU~M swAhA/ puSh+tiM ku ru swA b+h+rUM/ pa shaM ku ru A+oM hrIH/ mA ra ya hA
hA/ 'di ni dus gsum gshegs pa dang// phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba yi// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang// dbang du sdud dang drag pos gsod// lhun gyis grub par gyur pa yis// las kyi rnam grangs
kyang// bcom ldan dbang chen rta mgrin gyis// pad+ma bde gshegs spyi dril gyis// g.yo dang mi g.yo thams cad rnams// 'grub par byed pa'i rtsa
ba yin// sbyin sreg byed pa'i sngon du ni// rang lus srung bar byed pa'i sngags// A+oM
pad+man+ta kr-ita/ pi shA tsi par+Na sha ba rI sarba pra
ma rA ya swA hA/ dkyil 'khor byed dam sbyin sreg gam// nad ngan ro
chu la 'di sngags 'thungs pa na// nad rnams thams cad
'byung ngo// rkang gnyis rkang bzhi thams cad kyi// gdon rnams
hu lu ta trai sa twa tho hu lu hu lu/ ta
trai wa gats+tsha hu lu hu lu swA hA/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// 'thab mo kha ngan rgya 'dre dang// gdon lhas 'jigs 'byung thams cad zhi// me tog gang rnyed sngags bzlas te// chu
yi rgyun la bskur ba na// thams cad zhi bar

par gyur pa na// me la kha blta sa chu snyim pa bdun// sngags te gtor na me tshig thar// rkang gnyis rkang bzhi'i 'chi ba la// 'bras bu'i phub mas sbyin sreg bya// 'chi ba las ni zhi bar 'gyur// mthar ni shAn+ti ka zhes sbyar// thams cad zhi ba'i
sngags so// oM a ma ra Ni dzIban+ti swA hA// sngags kyi rgyal po
'di la ni// bzlas na nad rnams med pa dang// 'di la rtag tu bzlas pa na// tshe zad pa yang

rgyal bar 'gyur// til mar sbyin sreg byas pa na// nad rnams 'byin cing zhi gyur nas// tshe dang dbang thang rgyas par byed// puSh+ta ka'i sngags mthar sbyar// oM ka sngags sor bzhag she ku she sa nad twaM shu bya wa Sh+ma ni/ ma ma tad tha ta/ sa

dang ya ha/ p+pan se we bad dzin swA hA// mig 'gul zhi nas gang mthong ba// dga' zhing rgyas par gyur pa ste// gang la yid kyis dmigs bzlas na// thams cad bdag dag rgyas par 'gyur// A+oM sor bzhag dzaM b+he mu he da ya ma wa ti na hU~M swA hA// sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// tho rangs dus na lan bdun du// chu la sngags nas gdong bkrus na// 'gro ba kun dga' dbang du 'gyur// skar ma rgyal la pad+ma ni// dkar po kun+da'i dregs pa la// brgya rtsa brgyad sngags mig bskus na// bud med thams cad yid 'phrog byed// 'dres ma sran ma'i me tog ni// tsan+dan dkar po'i chur spangs nas// skar ma rgyal la brgya rtsa brgyad// sngags la thig le byas pa na// rgyal po la sogs dbang du sdud// ba sha ka'i sngags mthar sbyar// A+oM pad+mA n+ta kr-ita/ mo ha ga ya/ an d+ha ya/ sang ku ya/ uts+tsha ta ya/ b+he te sha ya/ mA ra ya// dzi wa tsit+ta rbad/ ling+ga gtub nas bsreg byas na// gang la dmigs pa gsod par byed// drag po'i las rnams 'grub par byed/ mthar ni a b+hi tsar+ya sbyar// A+oM pad+mA na kr-i ta shIn+taM/ ha ya gr-I wa phuSh+tA ka/ pad+ma pad+ma ba shaM ba shaM kaM pad+ma kro d+ha a b+hi tsa r+ya: sarba sid+d+ha hU~M phaT swA hA/ bdun nam nyi shu rtsa gcig gam// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas byas na// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las 'grub// yang gsang pad+ma chen po bshad// phrin las 'di dag rim pa yang// sngags ni thams cad nyid na yang// tshar gcod pa dang rjes gzung phyir// dang pos drag la gnyis pas dbang// rjes bzung rgyas dang zhi ba ni// phrin las kun gyi rim par gsungs// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rdzog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ phrin las bzhi lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdze nad rgyun gcod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di gsungs so// srid pa'i klu ni phyogasabazhi'i mtsho// gnas pa'i klu yang ma dros mtsho// chags klu chu mig brag do nang// rigs bzhi'i klu ni phyogs bzhir gnas// lha klu gnod sbyin byol song mi// klu rigs ser po 'khor dang bcas// rgyal rigs zhugs pa'i nad rtags ni// sha chen mdog dam nag la ham// gnyid che glal mang rmyang snying 'dod// rkang lag skrangs shing tshigs kyang 'khol// mig mi gsal la mgo yang na// sdong zla klu bdud klu btsan dang// pe dkar dam sri mtsho sman yin// 'dug gnas lung pa shar du bltas// phu ni lho nub mtshams su zug/ chu mig mgo gsum shing rtsi dang// ni'u sing 'dam rdzab can la gnas// nen ni ci las langs zhe na// sngags pa dag gis mnan par bya// zhugs dus lo bdun ma lon par// rang gzhan mi tshor de sos min// rje'u rigs gnod rtags sha mdog sngo// ham chags mgo gzhogs g.yon pa 'phrigs// dbung pa g.yon la brin pa dang// sna bug g.yon pa mi bde zhing// spro thung sems dkar rgol snying 'dod// sha ro dang ni bas ldag g.yon// spong zla gnyan bzed klu btsan yin// rmi lam chu dang 'dam gseb nyal// slob dpon bris sku lder tsho dang// 'thab mo byed pa rmi ba yin// zhing pa nya 'dra rdzi bo dran// rdo shing ba cag pa'i sa nas 'bras// rang gis mi tshor lo gsum sdod// mkhas pas brtags na sos par 'gyur/ bram ze'i rigs kyis zin pa'i rtags// gzhog g.yas rtsa dang khrag la zin// sha mdog sngo dmar smin ma byi// rtsa 'khyug lus 'khol mkhal ma dang// tshang rar sha ro 'byung ba dang/ snying mi dga' zhing 'gro snying 'dod// sdong zla klu btsan klu srin dang// sa srin dam sri gnod pa yin// gnod pa chu mig mgo gsum dang// gad pa shar shur shing rkang gcig/ lu ma gya gyu rnams la gnas// nyen ni thab dang gzhob la langs// rmi ltas rta dang bud med chu// khyi dang bya dang 'thab mo rmi// zhugs nas lo ni phyed dang gnyis// rang gzhan tshor de gso bar sla// dmangs rigs sha mdog sngo la ham// nad rnams 'gyur zhing 'gyur zhing 'ong// mi nad sna dgu yong bar byed// chung sri rde'u nad 'jug pa yin// sdong zla klu dang gnyan dang sman// dam sri dkor bdag bcas pa gnod// gnod pa zhang nye ma sru'i sa// yul phu zam pa lung gsum mdo// nyen ni mtshan 'gros dmar las langs// rmi ltas char 'babs rdzas bskyur nga// ri gzar kha nas rbab 'dril rmi// lo ni phyed dang gsum lon nas// rang gzhan tshor te gsos kyang sos// lo brgyad tshun chod nam yang sos/ gdol pa klu yi nad rtags ni// sha mdog ser la spos pa dang// ro rgyab na zhing snying yang na// ro stod brgyangs shing ro smad 'byar// tshigs rnams 'khol zhing rkang lag phra// sdong zla yul lha mgon klu dang// klu mo dkar mo bsdengs nas gnod// gnod pa phung khar rnying pa dang// lha khang mchod rten rgya gram lam// ban+de gdung chad srung ma gnod// rten ni mi gtsang thab gzhob dang// 'thab mo dme dang mkhon las langs// rmi lam g.yang sar phyin pa dang// khang zam 'grims shing lhung ba dang// khang khyim dud pas khengs pa rmi// zin nas lo gcig lon dus na// bdag gzhan gnyis kas tshor ba de// gnyis na sos te lo gsum na// mdze shur 'gro bas gso mi bya// 'byung lnga 'khor lo'i 'jug pa ni// sbubs kha rlung la dmangs rigs 'jug/ lte ba me 'khor rdo rigs 'jug/ rgyungs pa sa 'khor rgyal rigs 'jug/ klad pa chu 'khor bram ze 'jug/ gdol ba de rnams kun la'o// sha nad theb pa bzang ngan ni// dpral sha 'jum 'dus bram zes ngan// sog sha dbyings 'dus rgyal rigs ngan// lag gnyis bcud 'dus rje rigs ngan// snag chen brang 'dus dmangs rigs ngan// chu bar theb pa bzang ngan ni// ltag chu gnang 'dus bram ze ngan// skyid khung bzhi 'dus rgyal rigs ngan// mtheb chung zur rtse rje rigs ngan// rting chu khar 'dus dmangs rigs ngan// nya gnad thebs pa bzang ngan ni// byin pa'i nywa khar dmangs rigs ngan// gnyan gong gnad 'dus rgyal rigs ngan// gru mo bzhi gnas rje rigs ngan// sog pa mgo gnas bram ze ngan// rtsa gnad thebs pa bzang ngan ni// mthe bong rgyal rigs 'thab par ngan// rkang bol rgyas ba'i rtsa bdun dmangs// sgyid khung spyi bdud rjes rigs la// rtse'u mgo bcu drug bram ze bdun// gdong rtsa chu lnga don snying gnad// kun gyis zin par ngan pa yin// de dag kun tshang gdol pa'i nad// 'tsho bar dka' ba'i nad kyis thebs// nang ni mig la brtag pa ni// shing gi me tog rtse mor smin// nad rnams mig na 'char ba de// chu'am chang gis byad bkrus la// ser pos mig khebs mkhris nad rgyas// de ni rgyal rigs nad yin no// klad khrag chu pho khrag nad rje'u// mig chu chu ser bram ze'i nad// dmar ser spris ma bad kan dmangs// mig 'bras gting mtsho dol pa can// rtsa la gram pa rnam smin nad// nag po mthong byed don snying 'grams// rnam par smin pa'i nad dngos bzung// nad rigs dngos dang 'khor dbye ba// gru khung rgya la rigs rje'u rigs bsdongs// snying gar rje rigs rgyal rigs bsdongs// klad pa bram ze gdol ba'i 'khor// gsang gnas dmangs su bram ze bsdongs// de tshe kun tshang gdol dang dmangs// tri la brtag pa mi 'gyur bzung// dud pa khyi tri nag mo gnod// chu yi dri 'dra klu gnod che// tshil chen dri 'dra gnod rtsub ste// gdon phrad dri chu'i dri lta bu// gshin dri gdon chen rnam smin nad// sha yi mdog la brtag pa ni// smug nag gdon chen 'gyur ldog che// sha 'gul dkor bdag nag mo la// sha skam rnam par smin pa'i nad// sha spos rkang pa gdon thub rtags// sha ro dag la brtag pa yang// yas chags rkyen gyis byung ba'i nad// mas chags rnam par smin pa'i nad// phyed mar byung na gdon gzhan che// rma mdog dbye ba'i brtag pa ni// dmar la chu ser gdon zhen che// sngo skya ham pa nag mo dkor// rkang pa rgyu khung rnam smin nad// 'jug pa'i rigs kyi brtag pa yang// rigs kyi ma sru zhang nyes 'jug/ brko rlog shing gnyan rkyen gyis 'jug/ klu dang thug phrad go bur 'jug/ ku re rkyal ka rngam 'dod 'jug/ 'byung ba bzhi po log men brtag/ dgun dang nam langs sa yi dus// dbyar dang dros pa chu yi dus// ston dang phyi dro me yi dus// dpyid dang dgongs ka rlung gi dus// lo dang zla ba zhag dus dang// za ma shin tu nye ba'i dus// mi rigs 'byung ba brtag pa yin// rgyal rigs mgo nas 'jug pa ste// lci zhing 'thibs pa'i dug nad ni// rgyal blon sha bkra rgyang glu len// bram ze lag g.yon grang ba chu// go ldog yan lag mig mi bde// mthe bong bus gong sna phrag 'phrigs// rmi ltas chus khyer 'dam du byings// rje'u rigs lag g.yas tsha ba med// dmar zhing dgong la chu bur dang// tsha brab sha bkra me lce ris// ro smad mdun smad na ba yin// dmangs rigs rkang g.yas yang zhing g.yo// gdol pa rkang g.yon nag la gel// sha rus sbu dug brtag pa ni// sha dug pad+ma rdo rje nyams// ming tsha zil chen gor sho shor// rus dug skad phra 'dzer lung khrag/ glo bstud so sen bkrag rnams shor// spu dug mgo skra smin ma dang// gro ba sa shu dbyibs rnams shor// dug gsum tshang ba rnam smin nad// gso dka' zin pa ngan pa ni// mkhar bzhi ri bo'i mthongs dang lnga// rgya mtsho gnyis dang ro dkyil brgyad// nags kyi gtsug dang spu rigs bcu// thugs dkyil srid lte bcu gnyis pa// ri rab khung dang bcu gsum yin// tshang dang ma tshang mkhas pas brtag/ zin pa bzang ba'i rtags mtshan ni// sha 'phrigs rtsa 'phrigs za 'phrugs dang// shu ba bas ldag skam mig dang// mig 'phul sna g.ya' me dbal ris// mgo 'khor sna khrag chu ser 'ong// ser ka gas shing rma rnying dang// rkang pa sbrid cing rtsa rnams khol// glal 'od rmyang 'dod snying mi dga'// rkang sha mkhal na ngu snying 'dod// byad ni g.ya' shing tsha tshag byed// lus rnams 'khru zhing spro ba dang// ro stod rgyas shing gzer ba dang// sha mdangs bar na sha ro yod// mkhas pas brtags la gso bar bya// don snying dag la zin pa ni// glo ba sna rdog zhom pa dang// glo bur sna yi gong rnams shor// dbugs thung khrag skyug glo rdol 'chi// snying la ro stod brgyangs shing na// spro thung mi dran smyo bar byed// mchin pa lce la 'brum dmar yong// lce 'thon tha ma sha ror 'gyur// mkhal ma rkang bol skrang med 'dar// gzhogs g.yas drod chung yan lag zha// mtsher pa rna ba g.yas pa 'on// mchu skrangs
skam byin pa 'dar// mkhris pas mchu gas lus po skrangs// byad skrangs mig dang lus mdog ser// gso bya

nyes brtag pa ni// bems dang shin tu bems pa dang// dib pa shin tu dib pa dang// kha dog can dang kha dog bral// 'khor lo drug la bzhugs pa dang// snying po bzhi la zhugs pa dang// rtse mo gsum la zin pa dang// nam mkha'i mthongs nas babs pa dang// rgya mtsho'i gting nas rdol pa dang// gnad la lcags gzer thebs pa dang// nag po khro chu'i gzer thebs dang// kha dog lnga ru bstan pa dang// de dag rung dang mi rung brtag/ spang bar bya ba'i dmigs brtag pa// rgya mtsho chen po lung 'gyur zhing// chu bran mtha' nas g.yos pa dang// gangs ri dkar por zhu gyur nas// ri bo'i sul la gas pa byung// glo ba'i gnad la thebs pa dang// stod kyi dang ka 'gags pa dang// rgyal po'i dkor mdzod bcom pa dang// rkun po phugs su zhugs pa dang// gnye ma dag la zhugs pa dang// rgyal po'i pho brang btab pa dang// 'di dag mkhas pas spang bar bya// nad kyi smin lugs brtag pa ni// rus smin zha sgur gso bar rung// lo mang lon nas gso bar dka'// sha la smin pa skya bo dang// dmar 'gyur ser 'dus 'tsho ba yin// chu ser nag po smin pa dang// tshogs dang rgyas par gyur na ngan// chu ba la zhugs gso dka' dang// de yi sos rtags thub pa dang// dmangs rnams grong sprang 'khyams pa dang// tshigs bzhi mkhar nas phab pa dang// 'bras bu gnad nas thebs pa'o// de nas mig rtags rgyas par bshad// blta dus gtor ma sbyin pa dang// bden bdar bskyed rdzogs bsgom par bya// byang chub sems kyis kun khyab bya// gdon btsan bar du kha bltas te// ba lu shug pa'i me bus te// mig la klu sman dud pas bdug/ mig gi tha ma thur du bzlog/ gyen la bzlog ste g.yas g.yon bsgyur// ha re dag tu thub tshad sdad// mkhas pa dag gis legs par brtag/ mig la brtag pa rnam pa bzhi// 'grim rtsa'i brtag pa dang po ste// gnyis pa klu rigs bzhi bo brtag/ gdol pa kun khyab brtag pa gsum// bzhi pa las kyi rnam smin no// 'grim rtsa'i

pa la bzhi ste// shar na yan lag rtsa dang ni// lhor ni srid pa'i rtsa yin la// de bzhin nub na bad mkhris rtsa// byang na don snying rtsa yang gnas// yan lag rtsa zhes bstan pa yang// mig gi gra phug g.yas na 'char// nad gzhi'i rtsa la gram ma gram// rtsa bar byung na rtsa la gram// sked par byung na mgo phyogs de// rtse mo grol ni sla ba yin// srid pa'i rtsa la lo grangs brtag/ mig gi ya lcibs dag nas 'char// nag thig gcig byung lo gcig lon// de bzhin nag thig re lo re// g.yas su rgyal po dam sri g.yon// rbod gtong 'brel gzhi brtag par bya// bad mkhris gra phug g.yon nas 'char// 'di la gdon rnams yang bzung ste// mig sprin dkar nag mtshams su ni// rgyal rigs me tog 'di ltar 'char// mdung shing bkri 'dra rtse mo ni// sog khar byung ba rgyal rigs la// lag sor bkram 'dra byung na 'khor// rje rigs me tog dkar nag mtshams// klad khrag chu la pho ba 'dra// 'khor ni dmar ser mdog tu yang// bram ze'i me tog dkar nag mtshams// ser pos khebs pa 'ong ba ste// g.yas pa gtso la g.yon byung 'khor// dmangs kyi me tog dkar po ste// nag po'i thig le khyab 'brum dngos// nag la rtsub pa 'khor du bshad// don snying rtsa yi rim pa yang// mig gi grwa phug 'og nas 'char// nad gzhi rgyas sam ma rgyas blta// gdon gzhan che na rtsa bar 'gyur// sked par byung na rtsub pa yin// rtse mor byung na phra ba yin// klu rigs

yi brtag pa ni// phyi dang nang gi phyogs su bshad// mig la rnam pa gnyis yin te// mig gi phyi dang mig gi nang// dang po phyi yi rtags brtag pa// dbyibs ni nag la 'brum bu 'byung// de ni gdol bas nges par gzung// zur gsum song ba dmangs kyis so// dmar ser song na rje'u rigs// then dang chu 'dzag bram ze'i rigs// yo dang bzlog pa rgyal po'i rigs// de byung mig la bab pa'i rtags// rab 'bring tha ma gsum du brtag/ las las gyur pa spang bar bya// mig gi nang nas bltas pa ni// lus kyi phyi nang mtshan nyid gsal// nad gdon kun kyang gsal bar ston// mig sprin dkar la rtsa ris brtag/ rtsa ni g.yas nas zug gyur na// sha ro sha mtshan g.yas na yod// rtsa ris g.yon nas zug gyur na// sha ro sha mtshan g.yon na yod// ri rab rtse nas 'bab pa 'dra// ro stod yan lag nad gzhi rgyas// rgya mtsho'i gting nas phyung skyes 'dra// sked pa man chad nad kyang rgyas// gang na gnas pa de ltar blta// mig sprin dag la rtsa ris ni// kha dog dkar po sprul 'khyus 'dra// rgyal rigs nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog ser po nya gzugs 'dra// bram ze'i nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog dmar po sprul gyi gzugs// rje'u rigs nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog nag po sbal pa'i gzugs// dmangs rigs nad kyis zin pa'i rtags// kha dog sngo nag sdig pa'i gzugs// gdol pa'i rigs kyis bzung ba'i rtags/ mgo dang yan lag lus po rdzogs// go rim bzhin du shes par bya// phyogs la brtag par bya ba yang// pho g.yas mo ni g.yon nas brtag/ grwa phug gnyis ni shar nub gnyis// ya phebs ma phebs lho byang gnyis// gzhan rnams mtshams su shes par bya// ri mo'i rnam pa brtag pa ni// shar du rgyal rigs ri mo dkar// dkar ser 'dra ba sprul pa yin// thig le nas 'bras zhing sa gnod// sog 'dra byu na du ras nas// nyung dkar 'dra byung gtad 'dre yin// bre 'dra byung na khang sa nas// mdung 'dra shing bcad sa nas gnod// thig le dkar po gcig byung na// zhugs nas lo gcig len pa ste// de bzhin gnyis gsum bzhi lnga drug/ bdun nam brgyad thal mi mngon no// thig le shar du byung ba'i phyir// gzhogs ni g.yas la thebs nas yod// sha ro kha dog dkar ser te// byin pa brla shar thebs na thub// mchan khung thebs na mi tub po// rje'u rigs nad kyis thebs pa'i rtags// mig gi lho yi phyogs su 'char// thig le ser po sran leb tsam// rje'u rigs sprul pa dang bcas zin/ zhing sa nas ni gnod pa na// thig le ser po nas 'dra 'ong// sog pa 'dra na dur sa nas// nyung dkar gtad 'dre bre 'dra khang// mdung 'dra shing bcad sa
brad par thal nas mi mngon
rkang mthil mi thub de min sla// bram zes zin rtags nub phyogs 'char// thig le dmar po nas sog
dkar mdung 'dra zhing sa dur// khang pa rbad 'dre shing bcad
sa nas gnod// dmar po gcig
gnyis gsum bzhi lnga// brgyad du thal

nas de mi gsal// nub tu byung nas sha ro rgyab// kha dog 'bu ni so dmar 'dra// ltag khung byung na mi thub ste// gzhan du byung na thub par gsungs// dmangs rigs zin rtags byang phyogs 'char// thig le sngon po byung ba na// zhing sa khang sa dur sa dang// rbad 'dre shing bcad chos mthun sbyar// lo grangs thig le'i grangs la brtsi// brgyad du thal nas yal nas 'gro// byang du byung ba'i gnad ka yis// dpral ba snying gar thebs pa na// de ni thub ste gzhan mi thub// gdol pa mig gi 'bras bu 'char// thig le nag po gcig 'char te// nas 'dra bre 'dra sog pa 'dra// nyung dkar mdung shing gnod pa'i rigs// lo grangs grangs dang sbyar te thal// 'bras bu dag la byung ba yis// rdo rje mi ldang de mi thub// mo chags mi skye gdol nag po// lus gzhan dag la thebs na thub// sprul pa 'khor gyis zin pa na// shar lho rgyal rigs 'khor gyi rtags// sbrul dkar 'khyug 'dra glo la zin// glo 'tshubs mi bde sna zhom yong// lho nub rje'u rigs 'khor gyi rtags// lcong mo mjug rdum snying la zin// snying na dran nyams brjed nas che// nub byang bram ze'i 'khor gyi rtags/ spal nag rab tu chas pa ni// rna ba mi gsal gzhogs na zhing// mkhal ma rab tu na ba dang// byang shar dmangs rigs 'khor gyi rtags// sdig pa rwa brgyad 'dra ba 'char// mchin pa la zin khra snying 'dod// mchin nad dang ni mig mi gsal// gdol pa kun khyab rtags brtag pa// mthong ba'i dug dang reg pa'i dug/ kha rlangs la sogs yod pa ste// gdol ba 'khor 'khol rtags rnams 'tshol// spyi rtags kun dang ldan par bshad// rnam par smin pa'i nad rtags ni// lus rnams kun la nad rgyas pa// rgya mtsho chu gnyer 'khrugs pa 'dra// bar snang sprin gyis g.yogs pa 'dra// 'khor lo ral dang me tog nyams// nyi gdung ser bu mi bzod de// drag tu mchi ma 'dzag pa dang// mig gi dbyibs kyang steng steng po// 'bras bu zhu bar gyur pa ni// snying ni rab tu zad pa'i rtags// rkun po phugs su zhugs pa yin// 'bras bu smin pa zhes bya ba// chu ser nag po rgyas pa yin// cis kyang mi phan rnam smin las// gso ru mi rung spang bar bya// zhes gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril rngog ma leb rgan gyi rgyud las/ gdug pa gsum gyi gnod pa brtag pa ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mdze nad gso ba 'di gsungs so// dang por brtag par bya ba'i rdzas// mu zi gla rtsi shu dag nag/ gu gul dkar nag lnga snyoms te// grib bskams bsrubs ma de rnams cha// rgya tsha ril ma tsam dang bcas// snod gtsang dri chu bar mar sbang// dri chu 'khor mi sman chu 'thung// khrag dang chu ser chu ngan gyi// mdog la brtag pa man ngag yin// yang ni shu dag dkar nag gnyis// gla rtsi mu zi khral khrol rnams// bdun phul chu nang khu ba 'don// lto stong btang la zhag gnyis brtag/ sbrid dang na tsha med par brtag/ yang na ru rta dan rog pa// gnyis dang gsum ni chang du blug/ grub gzhug btang la gos drod nyal// tsha grang nad bzhi gang yin brtag/ mdze nad tshabs chung chu ser ni// ma rgyas pa la lto bshal bya// byug pa sbang ma'i zan bsten la/ a bar gnyis dang dan rog gsum// shu dag nag po lcum rtsa bsnyam// gu gul dkar nag zhib btags la// ma nu'i thang gis 'phul la gtang// mnan gzhel lcag dang dbyung ba dang// rjes gcod byas la lto sbyang ngo// mdze nad tshabs che rtsa shal bya// sha ba pho mo sbrad sogs bya// phye ma pad+ma rdog po bcu// sdig srin rgya tshwa sug smail rnams// thun re cha bsnyam phye ma ni// lcam pa'i thang gis phul la gtang// lcag tu chab tsha mang du gtang// tsha dug yos dug zug rngug zhom// yang na pad+me mar la 'dul// sdig srin sug smel thun re la// rgya tshwa lug ril pi ling bdun// glang mkhris thun gcig go bo'i brun// cha gsum tho rangs gtang bar bya// rjes ni tshod dang sbyar la bcad// thang sbyor pad+ma nyi shu gcig/ sdig srin rgya tshwa sug smel rnams// lcam pa'i thang la bsdus la gtang// khrag 'joms dom mkhris chang sbyar bcas// chu ser rang gar 'bab tu gzhug/ mdze nad bco brgyad 'joms pa'i stan// a bar rdog po nyi shu btab// btsan du sran ma nyi shu btab// dri chus 'dam btags mdog nag tu// gu gul nag po sha ril ces// bi bi ling ni nyi shu dang// nag 'tsher gla rtsi btsan dug phyed// gi wang chu nas ril bu 'don// zhag lngar gnyis gnyis gsum sbyar gtang// de nas rgyun du ril bu dgu// zla ba 'phel 'grib bsnon 'bring sbyar// sman log a bar dri chus bcos// tshabs che gla rtsi'i lca mda' yin// yang na gu gul nag po dang// grub thob dri chen ril bu las// yang na chu ser skems pa ni/ seng ldeng spyir bzhur khu ba gnyis// mu zi ser po gla rtsi dang// ba bla sbrang rtsi chu ser skems// yang na chu ser 'don par bya// mu zi rgya tshil btsan dug dang// chos sman gu gul shu dag nag/ dri chen dri chu mi phag zhun// bsdus te bsku ba dug slong rdzas// dri chu gla rtsi byang ba dang// sbru ma chu rtsas dbyung bar bya// btsan dug mu zi ldong ros dang// gu gul dri chu mi phag zhun// dug rnams sdud pa'i rdzas mchog yin// che chung 'don pa'i gnad du shes// yang na dri chen sbyor ba ni// mi khyi phag pa spyang ki'i brun// rdza yi nang du dri chus mnan// tshig ma'i dud pas bdug pa dang// dwangs ma lto ru gtang ba dang// skyo mas gnas rnams bsrung bar bya// shu ba sha ro la sogs 'joms// klu rnams thul dang nad don rtags// rdzas 'dis nges par byed pa yin/ yang na bdud rtsi drug sbyor ni// a bar ha lung nag po dang// gla rtsi gu gul nag po dang// pi pi ling dang gi hang gtang// 'di dus dri chu bsten par bya// sman nad mi ldang gdon choms 'ju// rdza yi snod du dri chu bsags// dang po'i them bu 'bo bar bya// gong ma btsags la bar ba bdug gdu yang// lhag ma sna nas klad par drangs// byin rlabs yod pas gso bar bya// zhabs kyi lhag ma skabs su don// yang na lag pa'i sbyor ba yis// phyir don khong bstud sna la drangs// 'dzu dang bde dang myur du 'byin// 'bras bu gsum dang phab tu sbyar// sbrang rtsi'i dri chu lcags kyi snod// ltor btung snar brngub drug sbyor ni// yon tan thams cad mthun par bshad// ril bu lo dus bsten pa yis// ma sos rus la zhugs pa yin// sngon 'gro rtsa bshal gtang bar bya// dngos gzhi rus sbal pho mo'i rus// ru rta phag rgod mche ba dang// rma bya'i sgro dang gi hang sngags// gla rtsi'i chu la ril bu bya// khye sus re re za bar bya// bdud rtsi ril bu za zhing bsrung// ril bu yun ring bsten byas kyang// lus kyi nad ro ma thon na// nad dang gdon gyi ro 'don pa// byang ba sum cu btul byas nas/ rgya tshwa lug gi ril gyi tshad// sug sme thun gnyis mtsham dkar dang// tshwa la thun ni re re la// gu gul nag po mtheb rdog tsam// sdig pa srin po thun re yin// zla gsum nang re nas phyed sman// rang gi dri chu bar bas 'phul// tshod dang sbyar la thun bskyed de// zas ngan mi za bsrung bar bya// sman sbyor rang nyams tshod dang bstun// 'di la sngon 'gro rjes gcod med// nad dang gdon ro rtsa lam 'don// na tsha yod pa'i sha ro la'o// na tsha med pa'i sha ro la// de la sman gyis byug par bya// khab kyi sa gtsags la kha phru gdab// de gnyis byug rdzas rgya tshwa dang// rgyam tshwa ru rta byi tang ka/ gu gul dkar nag kha ru tshwa// mu zi dkar nag btsan dug dang// rgya tshil thar nu gla rtsi dang// nus pa can gyi dri chen rnams// dang por bsnyams la lde gur bya// dri chus bskus la mar gyis byug/ rma rnying gso la mi sha dang// nya sha mi rkang lha ba can// glu mnye sbal ba'i tshil bu bcas//

dang sbyar la lums su gzhug/ rnag dbyung btsan dug thal ba dang// mgron bu dngul zangs thal ba lnga// ka ra chu rtsa dom mkhris kyi/ byug pa rma rnying nang du gzhug/ gso byed smin gyis tshe bsring ba// a bar skam thags 'dam thags bya// so ma ra tsa gi hang dang// thal kar rdo rje gla rtsi dang// gu gul dkar nag seng ldeng khrag/ ril bu dgu pa rdzogs par za// myu du 'chi ba'ang tshe bsring nus// rnag mdze skems pa'i rin chen sman// snod ni rdza ma me thub nang// gser srang bzhi la sum cha gsum// lcags phye dngul phye zho gnyis la// mu tig chang dang

chu// zangs dang gser phye sum chas g.yogs// kha bcad sol mes btso bar bya// rbod rbod tas tas nem nem byed// thams cad zangs la thim gyur te// dngos po mi mngon lcid kyis gsal// chu ser dkar po 'joms pa ni// seng ldeng khrag dang gu gul dkar// thal kar rdo rje so ma ra// zangs thal mu zi tsan dan dmar// mdzo mo shing rnams 'ju stobs sbyar// nag po la ni sbrang rtsi sbyar// ril bu byas la gtang bar bya// mdze nad thams cad skem par byed// rdo rje bzhin du 'joms pa'o// shu ba glo bur byung ba la// chos shing re lcag krad rnying dang// dres ma sug pa sgong thog dang// mu zi tshil chen rgya tshil dang// ra ru'i gzhob dang cod zhi'i thal// sgog skams tshwa dang pa yag dang// dud pa dmar nag byug par bya// sman gyi dam tshig bstan pa ni// tshwa dang bud med

sum skyur// sngo dang sgog phyogs chags pa spangs// me nyi lus ngag rtsol ba spang// 'phyags su mi gzhug sbrang rtsi bsten// spyod lam dam tshig bsrung ba gces// de nas ril bu'i tshod bzung ste// ril bu dgu las mang du gtang// bde'am mi bde brtag par byed// yang na gcig la blta ba dang// yar bsnon mar 'phri tshod gzung bya// zhes gsungs so// pad+ma gsang ba bkod pa rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ klu gnyan sa bdag gso ba'i le'u ste bcu
char pa dbab par bya ba dang// srog la bar bu bskor ba
gdug pa klu la gtad pa

thog dang ser bas yul mkhar 'joms// 'gro ba dbang sdud 'byor pa 'phel// lha srin gdug pa nad bzlog bsrung// ngo mtshar sprul pa'i rol mo bshad// sri bu gso bar gsungs pa yang// sngags dang rdzas kyis skye ba dang// mo gsham dag tu mi 'gyur dang// bus pa chags par gyur pa dang// lte
bsgyur bar bya byed rnams// sbrum
bu ni mi 'chor te// bcing grol lam ni be par 'gyur// bgegs
