bsad cing bsrung 'gyur ro// mtshon cha bsrung bar bya ba yang// shing shun 'khor lo sngags dang
rgyab tu yi ge btseg mas bsrung// yul khams thun sngags bsnyen pa dang// gta' ni bsdam par bya ba dang// sprin phung gtor nas 'brug kyang gzhil//
ba dang// thang la phab nas ri la bskyon// bdag gi thog lhung gzhan du bzlog/ lam ni bstan par
dang// dbus nas gta' bsdams gtor phud
gzug/ sra 'bebs maN+Dal bya ba dang// pra brtan chas

su gzhug par bya// mchod pas don rnams 'grub pa dang// sngags kyi bzlas pas dbab pa dang// nyal nas rmi lam ston pa dang// rtag tu brtson par bya ba'o// sha za mo bsgrub bya ba dang// gtsang mar legs par gnas pa dang// mtshan mo nyal nas brtag pa dang// g.yo 'gul sngags dang chu la dbab// gzhan la dbab bar bya
rnam par smin// 'byung ba'i rkyen dang gdon
sngon du las kyis mi 'brel ba// rang gi bu bsad rnam smin 'phog/ gzhan gyi chung 'tshe nad dkrug dang// sems can kun gyi
pho mo ma ning rigs can dang// las dang bsod nams ma 'brel bas// bu dang bu mo chu ngur nyams// dur khrod gnas nyams
yis// mi chags ma rungs byed pa dang// dper na me chu 'gal ba bzhin// lhan cig dag tu mi gnas so//
yis// sa bon drod med gnyis 'dzom bas// dgun
lta bur gyur// gal te chags chen bud med la// khyo

la// ma snyoms ches pas srid rtsa nyams// rang gnas 'byung ba rkyen dbang gis// bus pa chags par mi 'gyur bas// 'byung ba'i dgra la 'dzem par bya// spyir na lha srin chung 'tshe'i gdon// mngal nas chags par mi byed dang// chags pa ma rungs pa ru byed// skyes nas de la rnam par 'tshe// gdon

pos khyer na ngud mo byed/ bsen mos 'khru skyug sbyang ba dang// sa bdag skam nas 'gro 'gyur ba// rbad 'dre gdon bgegs bus pa'i gdon// kha zas mi 'phrod pa rnams// mi yi 'o ma rengs pa 'thung// ma zhu bo ba'i
me drod nyams/ nyams pas brang mchin 'bab gyur pas// pad+ma dbang chen ma yin
pa// 'di la skyabs pa'i lha gzhan med// 'di la skyabs su 'gro bar bya// de nas dbang mchog rta yi sku/ pu tra myu gu thon gyur pa// 'gro ba bskyab par bya bas na// skyabs
pa chen pos rab tu gsungs// A+oM pad+mA
kr-i ta na mo a t+yid t+ya/ ka ra ta ti d+hi pa
bi ti/ na ba sha tsha che
skye bar gyur cig swA hA// nA ga ge sar sa bon nad// gla gor zho sha rnam pa gnyis//
rtsis sprus pa 'o mar sbyar// blud de 'bras dang lhan cig zos// bud med mo gsham yin gyur kyang// de la bu ni skye bar 'gyur// rgya tshwa rgyam tshwa thal tshwa
zla mtshan byung nas khrus byas pa'i// bud
mo gsham la yang bu skye'o// a sho kan+d+ha'i rtsa ba dang// 'o ma srang
brgyad// bskol nas mar dang lhan cig blud// nges par mo

gsham bu yang skye// bus pa chags pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas lte ba bsgyur bya na// bdag nyid bsgom par bya ba ni// khro bo ldeng rje smug po'i sku// shin tu che ba 'gying bag can// shel gyi 'khor ba 'dom gang thogs// yum ni lha mo dkar mo nyid// g.yu yi smin ma can du bsgom// pho nyal g.yas la mo nyal g.yon// bud med lto ba'i shar lho nub// gang du gsang ba'i sngags gdab bya// A+oM ra ca a pa nA ya swA hA/ A+oM tra naa panA ya swA hA/ A+oM rA tsa dza ya pa nA ya swA hA/ A+oM a kA la mr-itU a pa
lan ni bdun bdun gdab par bya// lte ba'i steng gi g.yas su bskor// sbrum ma bu

ni mi 'chor phyir// tshon skud lnga la sngags btab nas// bud med sked par dkris pa yang// nub re la ni brgya brgya bzlas// A+oM kaM ka ma la ma sdom// tri tri ma la ma sdom// shon ma lam sdom// laM khaM raM yaM tiSh+Tha lhan// sbrum mar gyur pa lam bde'i phyir// bcings pa dag la grol byed na// e na ban ni kwa ka gang gti/ ra mo pa tsa ta/ pi pa to ro te pa ni/ yaM wa shad+h+ya b+ha ba to gor wa ni// lan bdun mngon par sngags pa yi// chu ni khyor ba gang yong ba// pho nyas sbrum ma la blud na// bu ni bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur// lto ba 'gyur zhing bu chags pa dang// bde bar sbrum ma'i bu skye ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bgegs rnams bsad cing bsrung// dur khrod lha mos bsrung ba dang// skyob par byed pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// rtag tu ma yis bzlas par bya// a ma ba sa pA kaM ba su jo mo phe DI du ba su/ sngags kyi rgyal po 'di yis ni// gong du bsnyen pa ma byas byang// rtag tu ma yis 'di bzlas na// 'jigs pa thams cad 'geg par byed// rdo rje dri chus thig le bya// phyir rgol thams cad rmongs par byed// log par phyogs par ldang bar byed// bcings pas bzlas na bcings ba grol// sma ba 'dod na me 'jigs thob// sri'u gso ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta yi rgyal po yis// mtshon cha bsrung bar bya ba gsungs// shing shun dag la bri
pa// mtshal gyi rtsi bas la 'bru re bri//

dbus su gang bsrung ming dang rus// A+oM ta na yan te nyags phaT/ sil sil phaT swA hA/ de yi rgyab tu sngags 'di ni// yi ge brtsegs mar bri bar bya// A+oM ra tsa ya bas gan d+ha ha ni swA hA// g.yas su yungs kar stong du bzlas// g.yon du gla rtsi stong du bzlas// dbus su 'khor lo rnam par gnas// le brgan dar du legs bris nas// tshal bu rta yi rngams bcings// skyes pa'i dbung g.yas bud med g.yon// dmag dpung dkrug kyang thub par 'gyur// mtshon cha bsrung bar 'dod pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas dbang gi rgyal po dpal// yul khams bsrung bar bya ba'i nang// nyung dkar nyung nag thal chen dang// drag po'i rdzas la bzlas pa bya/ phaT tsa gi tsig gi g+hu he mu le/ sha sha g+hu g+hu he he pri ri hu yu hu yu/ yu nan/ phur tsi te nan/ badzra phur tsi te nan/ rad na phur tsi te nan/ rad na phur tsi te nan/ ma hA phur tsi ti nan/ big nan/ pu tsi te nan/ dar po phur pa bcu byas la// sngags bri bzlas nyung thum po gdags// phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad dbus rnams su// mtho brtsig gta' yang bsdam par bya// de nas sprin gor 'bru gzhil nas// 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad phyag rgya bcas// rtar
rgyal po'i nga rgyal gyis// dmigs nas sngags ni gdab par bya// A+oM nA ga she du ma pa she/ ni ti tiSh+ta sa ma ya shAkya hU~M phaT/ sdigs pa'i mdzub mos gtor bar bya// ting 'dzin bsam pa brtan pos
sngags kyis gdab par bya// oM
ki ca lis ma ya/ sa la ni hU~M phaT/ A+oM nA ga sa dz+wa ti ni hU~M phaT/
ni hU~M phaT/ A+oM ku ti
ku ti bi ri ti u yu u yu/ i ri ti swA hA/ A+oM dung dung hu sa
kha rang rgyal rtse// sa man nyungs rtse nan gyis gnon swA hA// klu rnams rta yi rgyal po yi// spyan sngar khas blangs dam bcas pas// dam las mi 'di bsam gtan las// 'das na 'tshig byed

yin no// thang la 'bab na ri la bskyon// sdigs mdzub sha mi sna bug nas// bzung nas 'phang bar bya ba yang// bsam gtan sngar gyi dgongs pas bya// A+oM b+ha ri sha ya shu shu mu mu ti ti/ bi ri ti/ hu yu hu yu hU~M phaT/ bdag gi thog tu lhung gyur na// gnam chu nyid la sngags te gtor// gnam sa stong bzlog dgongs pa bya// khro bo chen po'i gar gyis bzlog/ A+oM
ga ru Da ya swA hA/
shu lu phu shu lu gu lu/ sha sha shu shu ti ti dz+wa la ti/
hu ya hu ya/ hu ru hu ru/ phu ru phu ru/ ti
hA/ phyag gi mthil du bya khyung 'gyed// klu yi rigs rnams thams cad kun// ma lus pa ni gtan nas 'joms// gnyan po gnyis su gyur pa'o// lam bstan ri sna yul 'jom du// lha srin 'byung po lo za
rnams// rang rang gnas su bsgyur bya ba// mdzes pa'i sa phyogs nyid du
bstan// A+oM na mo bud+ha ya/ na mo su ru su ru ki li mi li ye swA hA/ pa
karma ri pa/ e the'u the tha
ku hU~M phaT/ rdo ba sngon po rab mdzes la// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi bris pa la// mtshams pa'i rdo rje
phyed pas mtshan// gcig ni ba blas bri bar bya// gcig ni yung bas bri bar bya// 'og mthil bzhag la rdo sgrom
thun rnams rab blugs nas// dbus kyi phur
pa gnyis dang bcas// yul gyi dbus su sbas gyur na// chu 'khyags thams cad gcod par byed//
'byor pa yis brtson par 'bad// yul khams thams
khams gsum dbang// gtsang ma'i gnas su

nyer 'dug nas// maN+Dal rab tu mdzes pa la// dri dang me tog ldan par bya// bum pa dri yis rab bkang nas// sngags nas me long khrus byas nas// shin tu sbyangs pa'i ras gyon nas// tsan+dan dkar pos khyugs byas nas// me tog zhim pos brgyad pa yi// khye'u bu mo dbang du bzhag/ de ni khyim gyi chos ma gos// lha bu legs ldan dri med la// mchod pa gtsang ma mang pos mchod// ji ltar bsam pa dgos pa rnams// mi bslu bar ni ston par byed// lta bu dri med zla ba yis// ston byed sbags ni bzlas par bya// A+oM tad+ya thA/ sar sar/ se re se re/ so ro so ro/ mi ro man ta/ ta pra ti ka sha a be sha a be sha she la sha ku ta su tA ya na mo// bdag gi dgos pa'i bsam pa la// bdag gi don dang gzhan gyi don// da ge dang mi dge gang yin pa// de kun kho na nyid du smra// dgong ga rang gi mgo lag bkrus// byi dor byas pa'i maN+Dal la// lha bu legs ldan dri med de// mchod pa chen po byas pa ni// gsang sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas de// mi smra ba ni thub par nyal// ji ltar bsam pa'i rmi lam ston// drag tu bzlas brjod byas nas ni// 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa yis// dngos po rnams ni gtam du smra// sha za mo ni bsgrub pa na// pa ru ra yi shing dang ni// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing drung 'dug/ 'bum phrag gcig tu bzlas brjod bya// mi smra thub pas dngos grub myur// 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa ni//

rnams dag la smra bar byed// A+oM sha ba na pi sha tsi ni mu na DI swA hA// gzhan yang legs par khrus byas te// ras gtsang gyon nas dgon par gnas// khri phrag gcig tu bzlas brjod bya// phyis kyang de ni dngos grub 'gyur// mtshan mo spos la gsang sngags ni//

rtsa brgyad ni mngon par bzlas// rang gi gdong pa rkang ba la/ spos dang mar sbyar bsku byug bya// nyal nas bdag la rmi lam du// dge dang mi dge'i gtam smra'o// g.yo zhing skul byed bsgrub pa ni// dgon par khrus byas gtsang mar gnas// A+oM na maHsatwA nAM/ samyaka saM bud+d+hA bo d+hi sa twA nA na/ tad+ya thA/ A+oM tsa le tsu le dun ti ma hA wa t+yis tayawa te ni/ ka thA ka thA/ ya ya swA hA/ khri phrag gcig tu bzlas byas nas// me long ngam ni ral gri'am// mar me'am zhi chu yi snod// gang du sngags pas gtam ma smra'o// chu la brgya rtsa brgyad du ni// sngags nas kha gdong bkrus nas ni// thub pa mnyam nas rmi lam du// dge dang mi dge gtam smra'o// bra mtho cho ga thams cad las// gzhan la 'bebs par 'dod pa na// khye'u bu mo thams cad la// khrus dang gtsang sbras dbab par bya// rang nyid 'bebs na nyal bar rmi// dge dang mi dge'i gtam smra bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta yi rgyal po mchog/ gar dbang char 'bebs sbyar sgro bas// ngo mtshar gru char dbab pa ni// khams gsum sa yi don du gsungs// rdzas byas bsgom nas bzlas pa bya// dkyil 'khor gsum du char pa 'bebs// gtsang ma'i gnas su phyag dar byas// mda' gang gru bzhi rnam lngas byug/ klu yod gnas nas chu blangs te// dkar gsum mngar gsum klu sman dang// rams rngog bum pa'i nang du blugs// sbal khog
kha sbub nas// sbal gzugs gtor mas gang bar bya// dkar dmar klu sman pa'o dang// bag zan ril bu brgya rtsa brgyad//
'dzin pad+ma dbang gi sku// thugs kar phyag na rdo rje spyi

rab nas// dam tshig ye shes klu bskul nas// mtsho rlangs sprin char 'dod par 'phel// ril bu re la brgya rtsa brgyad// gsang sngags 'di dag bzlas par bya// A+oM nA ga gug hU~M/ nA ga le le/ dum pa le le/ nA ga rA tsa hU~M phaT// sha chang sgog btsong spang ba dang// dkar gsum za ba klu yi dam// yi dam klu dang 'byung po la// gtor ma rnam gsum gtang bar bya// gtsang mar gnas bca' chu gtor gtang// klu rnams dgyes pa'i chos yang 'don// de nas char ba dbab par bya// 'bebs par 'dod na sngags 'di gdags// A+oM g+hi li g+hi li/ b+ha ra sha yA b+ha ra sha yA/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/ ho ho ho/ phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ hU~M hU~M sab sab/ hU~M hU~M sib sib/ de la bzlas pa byas nas su// klu rnams mnas bsgag sngags 'di bzlas// A+o tsa ta tsa ta/ bi tsa ta ga la ta ga la ta/ sa tsa ra tsi ta swA hA/ lan bdun bzlas par byas nas ni// klu yi gtor ma sngags 'dis dbul// A+oM nA ga rA tsa swA
kha kha ba liM ta hU~M phaT/ A+oM nan du nA' ga rA tsa ya/ ba liM ta kha kha

hi/ khA hi ba liM ta hU~M phaT// drag por 'dod dam 'jam bor 'dod// bzlas pa drag 'jam bzlas par bya// 'brug dang bcas par dbab 'dod na// A+oM ta shi mu ki tsi/ she sa tsha pa li hU~M phaT/ na mo b+ha ga wa te rat+na ya/ ta thA a ne/ li bi shi ta/ be ra be ra daM daM thibs swA hA/ de ni 'brug bskul ba'i sngags yin pas// me 'brug b+h+ring gi ri ti dang// rlung 'brug ka la sha yi sgrogs// gal te phebs par ma gyur na// klu gnas chu mig gnas phyin nas// gcig ni ku la gtor ma 'bul// gcig ni ril bu sngags bzlas shing// gsum gsum bzhi bzhi chu mig brdeg/ khams gsum dbang sdud sngags 'di dgas/ thum thum chem chem badzra kha phyir phaT// gal te rlung gis sprin gtor nas// char pa 'ong bar ma gyur na// bum pa ri rab gzhal yas khang//

par rlung zed kun tshud bsam// oM ti ti ti la na na/ char ya chur ya ni tis ta lhan// rdo rje rgya gram kha bcad bsam// rlung zhi char pa 'bebs par byed// des kyang ma phebs sbogs chog ni// dkar gtor sngags bzlas chu mig sbubs// A+oM nAg a li mi li shi su

sngo khu dang// sha sna bsres la sngags thabs bsub// drag por dbab par bya'o// A+oM nA ga chu bi nA ga shar shar phob phob// des ni gdon mi za bar 'bebs// ngo mtshar gru char 'bebs 'dod na// seng ldeng glang ma'i phur pa la// rta mgrin bskyed bu gu gul 'dug/ char 'bebs sngags bris las byas nas// gang 'dod klu yi gnas su gdab// me long rten la ril bu brdog/ mi 'bebs
ri sha ya/ hU~M hU~M hU~M/

ho ho// phaT phaT phaT swA hA/ zhes klu'i tshogs la zhi ba dang drag pos char yongs su zhus nas dbab pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan rta yi mchog/ dpal ldan lha mo lcam dral gyis// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig pa la// par bu nag po'i cho ga gsungs// sngon 'gro dkyil 'khor ling+ga dang// par bu rtsa ba'i drag sngags dang// mgon po 'bod cing dgra bo dgug/ ma mgon rbad dang gsang las bya// rtags byung las mjug bsdu ba'o// dang por dben pa'i gnas song nas// gza' skar phur bu lag pa la// spang skong bshags dang chu gtor dang// 'jig rten lha 'dre ma nyes brdar// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi stegs bu'i steng// de dbus gru gsum brus pa'i nang// dgra bo'i ming rus khrag chen bri// de mtha' sngags kyis bskor bar bya// rabs chad nag po'i thod pa yi// par bu nang du sngags bris la// phyi rol khrag chen btsan dug dang// ro sol byug la 'brug khung bcad// gru gsum me ri rtsang dmar bskor// ling+ga'i tha ma bskor ba dang// par bu'i nang du bri ba'i sngags// A+oM pa Ni ru kritab+hi shi do ri nan/ rak+ta te dzo ni dza ya na/ sarba nin ro ti
ba ya nan// sngags de bri bar bya ba'o// de

phyi yi srung ma yang// tshangs pa brgya byin mgon po rnams// chu gtor rgyun mi chad par mchod// dgra bo'i bdun rgyud gcad pa'i phyir// ma nyes dbang gzug gtad bcol bya// sla nga'i nang du me yi ni// sha khrag snying gis gtor ma bya/ sngags
'di zhag gcig bzlas te 'bod// ma mgon gnyis la bstab par bya// A+oM shrI ma hA kA la ru si

ni ru ya bi ra shis/ rag mo tri ki ni khA hi ba liM hU~M/ mgon nag bang dang thod pa bsnams// lha mo ral gri thod pa nag/ rta dang drel nag zhon pa 'bod// sha khrag gtor ma rgyun du sbyin// A+oM ma hA kA la rak+sha du bo ni gu Na hri da hU~M/ A+oM ru ru ro ru tsa pa la a shug me hU~M b+h+yo dza dza/ bzlas pa 'di ni rgyun du drangs// de nas dgra srog snying po brangs// dgra bo nr-i sha ru si ru tri A kar+Sha ya hU~M dza dza/ khri bzlas nyung dkar lag tu thogs// dkyil 'khor bskor zhing phyogs bzhi ru// zhing lpags g.yab mos 'dul bar bya// mgon po lha mo rbad cing bskul// mgon nag rbad la nyung dkar brab// A+oM ma hA kA la kro ta rU pa rmugs// nag po nr-i thums yam b+h+yo// ha srog chums// rbad ni sa ba nr-i thum thum rbad rbad/ nyi ma zlos te mgon po rbad/ A+oM ru ru nag mo yak+sha te tsa snying thum ril/ kha thums sha rbad/ thum ril rbad/ shas ta ti kho tri ma ma thum yaM ril gaM bu naM thun/ yan shan rbad rbad// nyung nag sngags la lha mo rbad// skabs su dgra srog snying po drangs// yungs kar nyung nag ske tshe la// sngags nas ming gzugs dag la brab// mig dang rna ba sna lce lus// snying dang lus sems dbye bar bya// A+oM tsag shu ti liM yaM 'bu ni thum rbad/ A+oM shu ru ki ma pu ti yaM trug thum kha rbad/ oM mang kha ro la kro to bin du ma yaM thum rbad/ A+oM shan taM dun tig sha pi ru tis ma thum rbad/ A+oM b+hi ri gu ru ni rag ku tha yaM thum rbad/ ni Di ta tsa ti thims sa ma ya hur b+har yaM thum rbad/ A+oM tang ku re mar ya yug ti shig trig mun thum rbad// stong stong bzlas shing stong tshigs mchod// mgon po lha mo bskul zhing rbad// dgra srog drangs la zhing lpags brdul// zla phyed zhag dgu zhag bdun gyis// bar bu tsag tsag chom chom yong// slar yang rbad sngags bzlas shing brdeg/ de nas ming gzugs gtor mar bcug/ byang shar mtshams su gtang bar bya// de ni gang gis byas pa des// phyag na rdo rje lus srog 'byed// sangs rgyas bstan 'jig smos ci dgos/ dpal mgon po dang lha mos sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'i dgra srog 'bral ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rta'i rgyal pos/ klu bdun nag po bskul ba'i las// gnyen po bsgrub cing klu bdud 'bod// rbad phyi bsgrub dang gsang phyir gtad// zlog thebs 'byams sogs man ngag rnams// ma nor sngags 'chang rnams

bshad// dang por pad+ma dbang gi lha// rta gdong steng na bya khyung gnas// khyung sngags rta la btags nas bzlas// klu gnyan sa bdag gnyen por che// oM ga ru Ta tsa le tsa le hU~M phaT/ de nas dben pa'i gnas phyin la// sbal nag lto bar ling+ga la// bsad pa'i sngags kyis bskor byas nas// bar ma rbad dang tha mar 'bod// sbrul dang sdig pas mu khyud bskor// klu bdud nag po 'bod par byed// A+oM nA du na hi li nA ga 'dus// 'bod pas klu rtags mang po 'byung// de nas rbad sngags 'bum du bya// a shing nag po ti pa tsa ya/ nA ga kro tI shwa rI ya tri shaM rbad bu/ ku rak+sha tis tsa pa tsa lam bam/ sha truM mA ra Na dza dza hU~M/ klu bdud nag por dgra la rbad/ bsad sngags 'di la khri yis 'grub// nag po'i tsi tsa rgyas/ trag thum snying la gul gul/ myag myag rtsa bzhi bskum/ shan shan dgra bo'i srog la shan/ thur thur dgra bo'i tsit+ta sod swA hA/ rgyal rigs bram ze dmangs rigs gdol// de nas gtad pa bya ba yin// byang bltas byang shar 'khyil lkugs gtad// dmangs rigs gdol ba'i klu la gtad// sngon thog sbyor bas ldog pa la// thug phrad gtad dus 'gro rjes byibs// khyung sngags rma bya rus sbal dang// rin chen lnga khri shA ri ram// sbyor ba steng 'og yi ge bsnyams// ma 'dresaming dang dgra rdzas mchog/ thugs phrad gtong bar kha ru dang// rtsi sman byug dang dri mi gtang// rlangs pa ma shor cho mi brjod// khyung ngam rta mgrin bsal ba yis// 'khor lo gtad la pho brang gdab// mi blta lam bcad rjes bsub bskor// gnas su sbos kyi glang po bdug/ dgra bsad ldog dbyung sngon ma bri// 'byung ba kha bsgyur gser dang sbrag/ thebs na klu la gtang rag gtang// klu la rin chen byin par bya/ 'byams na 'gugs par bya ba yang// chu mig kun tu gtad dmag drang// 'gor bas spogs pa'i cho ga yang/ bskyar nas gtang bar bya ba'o// stong nyid blta ba rgyab tu gzhag/ yi dam lha yi sku dang 'grogs// gsang sngags chu bo rgyun mi gcad// rdzas rnams lus dang 'bral mi bya// sangs rgyas bstan srung rnal 'byor pa// pha tshan chen po dgra langs na// rtsa rgyud bcad par bya ba yin// gti mug klu yi ngan gtad kyis// dgra bo pha tshan can brlag par byed pa sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rje btsun bcom ldan 'das// dbang gi thog ser dbab par gsungs// skyes bus gzhu ni khengs par 'gengs// mda'i 'phang gnas su skyol bar bya// mde'us gnad la 'bigs bar byed// tshig chad song dam// 'dod pa 'grub nas gtang rag gtang// dus su ngar yang gdags par bya// ting 'dzin gsal gtsang rnal 'byor pa// dben gnas gnyen por dbang btsug la// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi la// dbus su pad+ma rta mgrin sku// bka' sdod rtsibs bzhi gdong mo bzhi// hrIHyig ma ra tsa sha las// stag dred ba glang chu srin bskyed// stag dom glang nya snying khrag bcas// ra khyi bya mi snying khrag rten// snel gri'i thod par khrag dug kun// nyung dkar lha phral sngags kyis brab// oM rag mo rag mo snying tsa la b+h+yo// A+oM phag mo yag mo dgu bo'i snying la b+h+yo// A+oM tsab mo tsab mo// khrag la mu sha ma b+h+yo// A+oM rag mo rag mo snying kha rag mo la b+h+yo/ de bskyed drang bstim gtor ma dang// rak+ta sman gyis mchod pa bya// thun la rgyu rtsal bsnyen pas 'bod// A+oM badzra lang ting lang ting bra
A+oM badzra lam b+hA+o d+ha/ a shu me badzra sun spri hU~M dza/ A+oM ga

A+oM ki liM spri ka li ho ba ya hU~M dza/ ming sring grogs mdza' btsas ma rnga// rmos byed yur ma yur ba dang// chu chen 'khyags pa ri nyil snang// thog ser 'brug sgra grub pa yin// de ni chu ril sngags ni bya// oM rag mo rag mo ru ru/ tsa ba snying kha rag g+hu sid na ma shag mu shag mu sham phye phroM hril/ dur phroM/ dkar phroM/ shu tri phroM/ yug ti smin/ sha ra sha la de drag tu phob// rtags dang mtshan ma nang du gsal// phyi rtags dngos su 'bab cing drag/ de nas dbab par bya ba ni// A+oM ma ma rak+sha 'da' na thun thun phroM hril/ ma ma shig shig ru tra nan/ pu rtse pu rtse phroM hril/ ma ma ru rta nan/ b+h+yo dza mun dza rbud thum/ thum thun b+h+yo/
lo thog snar mo mA ra ya phaT phaT/ dbus kyi thod pa 'ong dkyil du// shar thod yul gyi lha
gnan// nub thod klu gnyan sa bdag la// lho ni dam rdzas ri sked la// byang
ni thun rdzas ri rtser sba// thod pa khrag lam
'brel bar bya// phebs nas gta' dbyung gtang rag gtang// gtor tshogs mchod par bya ba'o// kun tu thun kha gso ba dang// dgos pa'i dus na dpa'
la 'chang// bstan pa tsam gyis gzhan 'pham mo// nga rgyal thog ser
dbang 'dus 'byor pa spel ba gsungs// bsgom dang sngags bzlas kun 'grub pa'i// mgon po gnod 'dzin yang
dag bshad// stong pa'i ngang las dzaM yig las//
po gnod 'dzin dmar po'i sku// g.yas pa gser mdog a ru ra//
nor rgyun dmar mo rin chen snye//
kuN+Da li in+d+ra ni mu khaM b+h+ra ma ri swA hA/ A+oM
b+ha la dza len+d+ra ya pi tsi kuN+Da li ba su d+ha ri b+h+rUM rat+na sid+d+hi ba su puSh+ting ku ru swA hA/ chu yi lhag ma phyugs la blud// gtor phud
spyod rin chen char pa 'bebs// nor bu bum bzang bang mdzod ldan// dbul ba yongs su sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas rta mchog phrag dog ches// 'khor lo tsha

tsha gsang sngags nyung dkar bzlog/ rtsibs brgyad sde brgyad lta ba la// 'dod pa'i ming gzugs sngags dang bcas// tsha tsha dkar nag zhabs sprad ste// dkar po rang nyid nag po gzhan// A+oM ya ma rA dza hUM b+ha ta ya ma ma rag mo long kab+ha sha ya nA ga ra tsa ha hU~M bzlog kha shar ling baM tan sad// rak+sha g+h+ri pa mu khe

he ra sad/ yak+sha gri ba la char sad/ pra ma ya ru tra sad/ rA hu la sarba duSh+ta na sad/ oM AHhU~M/ saM b+ha ra mu ta ka ra hU~M hU~M phaT phaT/ nyung dkar sngags te brab par bya// tsha tsha dkar nag gi ting nge 'dzin to// dbang chen spyi dril rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ thun mong dngos grub las
de dag ji ltar bgrod gyur pa//
phyi dbyibs nang sngags gsang ba dbang// mthar thug rlung du
bzhi pad+ma can// rtsa mi rlung lnga
ngag yid// rlung sems 'dus pa'i bde bar brgyal// stong pa dgrar langs dran pa bzhi// lus dang ngag dang sngags dang ni// stong pa
'ba' zhig dran par bya// rdzu 'phrul rkang pa bzhi pa'i rlung// chu rlung me rlung rlung gi rlung// sbyor lam drod dang rtse mo la// drod ni chung
nang rnam pa gnyis// dbang po lnga ni
khyab par byed pa'i rlung// gzod cig dbu mar rlung sems 'dus// chos mchog 'khor 'das tshogs gnyis rdzogs// stobs lnga yan lag rlung lnga nyid// rgyu
par rgyu dang yang dag rgyu// shin
'das pa'i lam// mthong bsgom mthar phyin rnam pa gsum// 'khor
dang srog shing gsum// byang chub yan lag bdun du rigs// bsgom lam rnam shes tshogs brgyad po// kun gzhi yid dang nyon mongs yid// mig dang sna dang rna ba lce// lus kyi rnam par
shes pa nyid// mthar lam rtsa dang yi

bdud rtsi rlung gi 'gros bzhir thim// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dang// bzhi pa lnga pa drug pa dang// bdun pa brgyad pa dgu pa dang// bcu pa bcu gcig bcu gnyis la// bcu gsum bgrod pa'i sa rnams ni// phyi rtags bdud 'dul dral ba dang// nang brtags phyi nang rlung 'gags pas// de kho na nyid

rnams 'char// mthong dang 'gyed dang 'byed 'chad ston// rdzu 'phrul sa la rim par 'gyur// zhes gsungs pas// lam lnga sa bcu rdzogs pa rnams// 'jig rten drug tu gsal bar gyur to// pad+ma dbang chen gsang ba khro bo 'dus pa// pad+ma gsang ba rngog ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/ sa lam rim par phye ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//// de
nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rnal 'byor pa'i lam grub pa la gnas pa 'di gsungs so//
par smin pa khyung seng 'dra// tshe la dbang ba nyi zla 'dra//
lha sku 'dra// lhun gyis grub pa gnyid sad 'dra// dang po sar ni chud pa dang// sa
zla'i tshe dang mnyam gyur pas// rang
srog la dbang thob 'gyur// rang gi yi dam gsal gyur pa//
dang yi ge bdud rtsi rlung// rnam

par gnas pa chos kyi nyi// legs par sad pas lus 'dzin 'gyur// thos bsam bsgom la rab gnas pa// lta ba ting 'dzin dbang na gsal// sprul pa'i sku las chos kyang nyan// lha mi'i lus su gnas par ston// longs spyod
chos kyi sku la rab gnas pas//
reg rgyal ba drug/ ces gsungs so// dbang chen bde gshegs spyi dril
ma le brgan gyi rgyud las/
gyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o//// de

mgrin ni// ting 'dzin snyoms zhugs 'di gsungs so// sems kyi rnal 'byor thob pa yis// yan lag ces su bstan pa yang// so sor spang dang bsam gtan dang// dbugs dgag stong dang gzung ba dang// rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin ni// sbyor ba'i yan lag drug ces bya// so sor spong ba sdom la gnas// dngos po gzhan dgag spang bar
bya// de yi ming grangs bcas pa ni//
la gnas pa ni// ji ltar tshul tsam rnam dag pa// 'dod pa'i g.yeng ba med byed cing// 'gyod pa'i dri ma med pa yis// rtag tu dbang po sdom pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin thob pa'i rgyu yin
ltar// so sor spang ba zhes
yid dang dbang po bsgoms nas ni// rnam par shes pa skye ba
ba'ang ma yin la// spyod yul
tu rang gi lha nyid du// bdag nyid bltas te sbyang bar bya// dang por gzhan pa ka dag gnyis// spang bar bya ba 'di dag ni// dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing// 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas
kyang// ting nge 'dzin ni ma zin pa//
rlabs nye 'gyur bas// bsam gtan snod du 'gyur ba yin// 'di ni so sor
de phyir bde ba longs spyod de// so sor spang ba zhes kyang bya// 'dod pa'i g.yeng bar gyur
pa spang// so sor spang ba sdom la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan 'brel dang yul du bcas// dmigs par bya ba'i yan lag can//
pa dang// sdig to mi dge ba yi chos// dben pa dag
las de skyed yin// 'di yi phyir na de'i 'og tu// bsam gtan bstan pa rigs pas bshad// bsam gtan yul
ni sku gsung thugs// gsang ba gsum
yul du bya// de la sku
yi gsang ba ni// lha yi phyag rgya gzugs kyi sku// kha dog dbyibs dang g.yo ba yi// smin ma
mig dang so dang mchu// bzhin dang lus dang
chen dpal gyi rgya// rang don las rnams grub byed pa'o// de ni sku yi tshul rnams kyi// sgo nas bsam gtan yul
bcad pa// nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i

gsung// lha yi thugs la ljags steng du// chos kyi yi ge kha dog dang// dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa dang// de yang sgra dang sgra don gyis// chos nyid brtag pa brtag cing dpyad// bsam gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te// sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni// rnal 'byor thob par bya ba yin// sgra yi mtha' la gnas
gi sgra grag byed pa ni// bsam gtan gtso bor bshad pa yis// skabs 'dir g.yeng

rdo rje bsgom// ye shes sems dpa' bsgom pa ni// de ni thugs kyi mtshan ma la// de yi don ni byang chub sems// chos kyi sku ru gnas pa yis// mtshan ma rnam par bcad pa ni// thugs kyi bdag nyid de yin te// de ltar gsal ba
dmigs pa/ bsam gtan bya ba'i yul yin no// gsang ba gsum
thams cad bsdus// phyag rgya yongs su dag pa
rtags tshul bsdus// bsam gtan yan lag
dga' bde gnyis// sems ni rtse gcig pa dang lnga// yan lag tshul gyis dmigs par byed// gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan nyid la// ji lta
rtogs pa'i blo// de la rtogs nas skye ba'o// de la spyod par byed
pa ni// de nyid la ni blo
nyid kyis// yang dang yang du sbyor bya zhing// de yi
'jug pa'o// de la dga' bar bya
ni// rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam
po yi// 'dra snang rnam par 'byung gyur te//
tshe 'dod pas dben gyur pa// sngar ma myong ba'i don
cher skye'o// de la bde ba bya
ni// de dbang sems bsdus thob pa na// lus dang sems kyi bde ba ni// des
gcig pa ni// de ltar sems kyis bsdus
'gyur las// shes pa dang ni shes bya yang// gnyis su snang bar mi skye
de ltar bsam gtan dag gis ni// sems ni zhi bar bya ba la// shin tu dul bar

bya ba'i phyir// dbugs kyang dgag cing gtang bar bya// bslab thabs nad du zung ba dang// mtshan ma sngags dang phyi nang rtags// rnal 'byor pa la snang gyur bas// shin tu bslab par bya ba gces// de la ji ltar bslab pa'i thabs// pho rlung mo rlung ma ning rlung// rnam pa de gsum bslab pa dang//
la gtad dang nang du 'jug/ khong du gnas la bslab pa dang//
rlung chu rlung me rlung dang// rlung gi rlung la bslab
pa'i go yang du mar snang// ji ltar bslab kyang 'gal ba med// gdul bya'i rnam rtog bsam yas kyang// de snyed
ma nges rgyu ba'i dbugs// nang du gzugs la bslab par bya// de nas
pa thob par gyur pas ni// mtshan ma rnam lnga 'byung bar 'gyur// dang po smig rgyu 'dra ba dang// gnyis pa
la ni du ba'i tshul// gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra// bzhi pa mar me
du 'bar// lnga pa rtags su snang ba ni// sprin med pa yi
phyi nang gnyis// phyi la nyin dang mtshan mor snang// de la phyi rtags
gyur na// phyi rol mdun gyi nam mkha' la// rmi lam du ni 'od snang 'gyur// dang
bu me khyer 'dra ba yi// 'od 'dra ba ni
'gyur// de la brtan par gyur nas yang// mar me'i 'od snang mthong bar 'gyur// de nas brtan par gyur
sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin// thams cad du ni gsal
dbang du gsungs// mtshan mo'i ltas ni thams
cad du// me yi 'od ltar 'bar ba ni// rim gyis rgyas par mthong 'gyur ro// nyin mtshan khyad med nang gi

dngas pa bzhin// thams cad ma lus nyin mtshan gyis// khyad par med par mthong bar 'gyur// nang gi rtags ni rang gi sems// je zhi je gsal gyur pa nyid// sems nyid 'od gsal nyi zla bzhin// ma bcos ngang du gzigs par 'gyur// dbugs 'gags stong gzugs bzung ba'i
thob nas// shin tu sbyangs ba thob bya'i phyir//
rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya// steng 'og sgo
nas gsang ba gsum// brgya dang grangs

te dngos grub rnams// thim pas mi zad rgyan du 'gyur// gsung ni rlung dang sngags bcas spros// de nyid mi zad rgyan 'khor gsungs// thugs ni phyag mtshan spros dang bsdu// de yang mi zad rgyan 'khor 'gyur// b+ha ga la ni ling+ga bzhag/ pad+ma'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// gsang ba gsum las byung ba yis// rjes su dran pa bcu drug bsgom// dbang po rab 'bring tha ma yi// rgya ni che chung rang stobs kyis// sems kyi rtsal ni sbyang bar bya// rnal 'byor rang sems rtsal sbyong bas// sku dang ye shes phyag mtshan rnams// gsang ba gsum po'i spro bsdu kun// mang nyung sems kyi stobs dang sbyar// sems ni rang bzhin ma nges pas// til 'bru ri rab lta bu'am// gcig nas gang+gA'i phye rnyed par// sems kyi rtsal ni
de ltar ting 'dzin rtsal sbyangs nas// lus dang sems dang lha la dmigs//
byed dang mi byed pa'o// lus la dmigs par byed pa'o// dbugs
gnas dang yul dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon
de la dbugs kyi rang bzhin ni// lus nyid khams lnga'i rang

chu me rlung nam mkha' 'byed// sa yi dbugs ni sra zhing lci// chu yi dbugs ni dal zhing 'joms// me yi dbugs ni 'bar zhing dro// rlung gi dbugs ni yang zhing rtsub// mkha' ni 'phyo zhing rgyu mi tshor// dbugs kyi gnas ni lus nyid la// snying ni khong stong na dag dang// glo ba khong stong nang dag gnas// dbugs kyi rlung ni nang du yang// lus kun la yang khyab
par gyur// shas cher lte ba yan chad
'dus kyang mi shes// dbugs kyi lam ni kun khyab kyang// gtso
rnam gnyis te// 'dzin pa'i las dang phyed pa'i las//
reg pas lus la phan 'dogs shing// lus kyang 'dzin
pa dang// sems kyi 'dzin kyang dbugs kyi byed// sems kyang 'dzin par byed pa
'dzin pas na// srog 'dzin pa yi las byed do//
bar byed// dbugs la dmigs pa'i thabs sgo mang// phyi la 'gro na gtang bar bya// nang du
'gro na dgang par byed// khong du gnas na gzhag par bya// gang ltar dmigs kyang 'gal ba med// thams cad gdams ngag
pa gnyis// dbugs kyi sgo dang
de la mthun par dmigs pa ni// g.yas nas rgyu bar byed pa ni// de ni me dang rung gi khams// g.yon nas rgyu ba sa chu'i khams// dbus nas rgyu ba nam mkha'i khams// de las phye
g.yon// re re la yang khams lnga'o// lnga lnga tshang bar rgyu ba
rags rim mdo ru bsdus pa
g.yon re re dag la yang// 'byung ba
re re'i cha shas su// brtan pa
rnam pa'i sgo nas so sor phye// de la dmigs
chu dkar me ni dmar// rlung ni ljang ser nam mkha' mthing// de ni rgyu ba tha mar rgyu// gru
bzhi zlum po gru gsum dang// zla gam spros bral chos 'byung dang// gtso
bo che la 'khor rnam phra// goms nas chen po phra bar snang/ grangs dang rnam pa nges pa ni// dmigs pa brtan par 'byongs nas gsal// rnam pa'i 'od dang yi ge dang//

mo'i sku// de lta bu yi rnam par dmigs// chos la ma brtan par dmigs la// bye brag so sor dbye ba med// dbugs ni phyi nang rgyu tsam dmigs// mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang rung// gcig la dmigs par bya ba'am// reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung// sems ma yengs par gtad pa ni// sems zin 'ba' zhig tsam gyis mtshon// spyi ru grags pa'i kha dog dang// bongs tshod skyon dang yon tan dang// khams rnams gdug pa'i mtshan nyid pas// brtan ni yul du dmigs pa tsam// mthu brtas dus ngan skyon yon yod//
gdug pa zhi byed mtshan nyid la//
ser po gdug pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan// dmar po gdug pa mched mtshan nyid// nag po gdug pa'i slong ba'i mtshan// mtshan nyid de ltar byed pa'o// reg bya dang ni bongs tshod dang// sra zhing sbom pa ltar

snang ba// lus la mi bde ba dag 'byung// phra zhing dwangs pa chu zla ltar// rdos pa'i sha chung dmigs pa na// lus la mi bde mi 'byung ngo// dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// lus kyi rnam pa la mkhas pas// gcig phur blta dang
gtsang mar blta rnams bzlog/ lhag mthong don yang bskyed pa'o// sems la gnas pa
rung gyur pa// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang las// dmigs pa'i thabs dang yon tan no// sems la dmigs pa'i
rang bzhin ni// snang ba'i khams la
rlom sems pa yi khams dang ni// dngos po so sor

sa chu me rlung mkha'i// khams lnga'i rlung la zhon nas su// khams lnga'i lus la gnas pa'o// sems kyi yul ni rnamarig pa// snang ba'i yul ni chos rnams la// rlom sems yul na sems nyid do// rnam par rig par bya ba'i yul// de ni phyi yi skye mched rnams// sems nyid lam ni dbang po rnams// sems kyi las gnyis 'dzin byed ni// 'dzin pa'i las kyis chos rnams 'dzin// byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi/ 'du byed thams cad ma lus pa// mngon par 'du ni byed pa'o// sems la dmigs pa'i thabs dag ni// dbugs la dmigs pa la rung nas// de nas dran dang shes bzhin gzung// sems ni ji ltar bskyed nyid dmigs// sems kyi mtshan nyid khong chud 'gyur// sems la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni// bdag tu blta dang rtags par blta/ dngos por blta ba thams cad
pa'o// sems nyid las su rung 'gyur te// de yis zhi
pa las rung nas// lha dang dmigs par byed pa ni// rang bzhin gnas yul lam dang bcas// dmigs
rim pa dang// dang por bar tha sgom tshad mod// de la
ni// chos nyid rnam par dag pa dang// rnam par mi rtog ye shes dang//

cir yang sa le mkhyen pa yis// ye shes 'gro 'dul gzugs kyi sku// so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos// ston pa'i gsung de chos rnga yin// lha yi gnas ni sems can gyis// lus dang sems la gnas pa nyid// lha yi yul ni chos kyi dbyings// thugs rje'i zhing rnams gnas pa'o// lha yi lam ni gang yin pa// 'gro dang 'ong ba mi mnga' yang// lha yongs bzung ba'i sems can ni// sems can skyabs ni lha yin te// 'brel gnyis sgo nas lam gyur pa// lam gyi chos dang lung gi chos// lha yi lam du gyur pa'o// lha yi las ni 'dzin par byed// 'dzin
las ni yon tan ni// thams

ni sems can rnams// thams cad grol bar mdzad pa'o// lha la dmigs par byed pa'i thabs// lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgom pas// de la rnal 'byor rnam gsum gyi// tshul gyis byin gyis brlab tshul lam// de nyid yongs su rtag pa'am// rdzogs tshul gang yang rung
bsgom// lha yi yon tan rnam gnyis tshogs// dus gcig rdzogs par
pa'o// de ltar dmigs pa rnam gsum la// rim gyis bslab cing rim
brten// 'di ni phyis pa dang po ru// zhugs pa tsam du dngos su ni// lus nyid sems kyi rnam
de bas phyi nang snod bcud kyi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
ngo bo lha nyid shes// dang po lha ngo shes
pa yin// bar du lha bsgom

dang sems don gyis// bcos pa'i thabs rnams bstan pa yin// tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad/ mtshan ma med pa'i lha tshad ni// byang chub sems la lha ru bzhag/ mtshan ma lha yi sku bsgom tshad// lhang nge lhan ne lham
ni ma rdos pa// lhan ne ba ni
ma g.yos pa// lhang nge ba ni ma bsgribs pa// ma rdos snang
zla lta bu'o// ma g.yos pa ni bying
kyi// zug rngu ma skyes pa yin te// nor bu rin chen 'od lta bu// ma bsgribs de gnyis dang ldan pas// ma rtogs pa
pa dang// mi gsal ba yi
gnyis/ med par shin tu gsal
mi bzod ltar// lha sku shin tu gsal ba'o// tshul
byed par ma nus na// bzlas brjod
yi de kho nas// lhar grags lhun grub sems can khengs// rang la gnas pa de rtogs yin//
bzhin slob bar 'dod pa yis// de dag rnams kyis tshul du
don lha yi ting 'dzin ni// ji ltar yin pa yid la bya// des zin cho ga rim gyis bskyed// skad cig gcig la rdzogs tshul lam// bag chags shugs sam

mos pa dang// nga rgyal dag gi sgo nas kyang// ma yengs pa yi sems kyis gzung// bzlas brjod bya zhing bsam gtan 'jug/ bzlas brjod byed pa'i tshe na yang// lha ni mi bsam ma dmigs rung// las sam 'bras bu gang dmigs kyang// spyir
ni/ kun rdzob mtshan ma'i lha nyid la//
sems dpa' bye brag lha zhes bya//
can gyi skye bo'i lha// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma lhar grags pa//
btags pas rnam pa du mar
rnam par smin pa'i lus dbyibs
brag dpe phyi zhes pa dang// de
can zhes btags pa dang// de
rnam par smin pa'i gzugs// bye
ye shes byin brlabs nyid// dbyer
de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnam// thugs ni
gsang ba'i ye shes nyid// mtshan ma'i gzugs su sprul pa ste// chu nyid grang pa'i rkyen gyis ni// 'khyags rom gyur pa lta bu'o// chos rnams lhun gyis grub pa yi// phyag rgya'i rang
bzhin yin pa la// las kyi

ba de// shin tu dag par 'dul gyur rnams// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ngo// sems can khengs pa dag la yang// las ni dag par gyur rnams la// sprul sku rab byung cha lugs snang// de yi 'og ma rnams la ni// cha shas dag

la ni// thun mong gzugs brnyan la brten pa'i// phyag rgya tha dad snang bas te// thams cad lhun gyis grub pa la// phyag rgya'i bye brag med par 'dod// de ltar snang ba thams cad kun// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// rang lus yid ni rtsal

grub// sngags ni ye shes rang la gnas// lus khams bdud rtsi chen po rnams// snying po rlung gi 'phro 'du can// sprul sku mdzad pa bcu gnyis rdzogs// stong gsum ma lus 'dul ba'i mgon// longs sku 'khor 'das gnyis la spyod// sa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' yi// shes bya'i sgrib pa rnam par sel// chos sku dri ma med pa ni// phyag rgya chen po mchog gi sku// sku gsung tha dad med gyur pa// ngo bo nyid kyi sku gyur pa// gcig dang tha dad las grol ba// gdul bya'i rnam pa so sor snang// nam mkha'i dbyings nas rang shar ba// nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor rab rgyas pa// mun med mun pas bsgribs
mun snang don la grub pa
rgyud las/ sbyor ba yan lag drug

bcu drug pa'o//// de nas bcom ldan 'das rje btsun 'phags pa rta mchog chen po la 'khor rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho rje btsun gar gyi dbang// rig pa bzhi la gzigs pa yis// rgyud lung man ngag ma lus pa// bcings pa'i mdud pa grol bar byed// 'od gsal sems kyi rang bzhin rtogs// dam tshig dngos grub lo tog smin// dug lnga bde chen lam du grol// 'khor 'das nyon mongs lnga mdud bkrol// dbang gi sku la ma
